Founded in 1949 as a medical repair company  Medtronic is now among the worlds largest medical technology  services and solutions companies  employing more than 85 000 people worldwide  serving physicians  hospitals and patients in more than 160 countries.

organization_site: Visit the Mitsubishi Chemical Group website
organization_description: Mitsubishi Chemical is one of the largest chemical companies. It produces petrochemicals  carbon products  agrochemicals  pharmaceuticals  information and electronics-related products  plastic-based products  speciality chemicals  and synthetic or chemical fibres. It has manufacturing facilities worldwide. On 1 July 2022  its name changed to Mitsubishi Chemical Group Corporation.

Mitsui & Co.  one of Japans largest general trading companies  multilaterally pursues business that ranges from product sales  worldwide logistics and financing  through to the development of major international infrastructure and other projects in the following fields: iron and steel products  mineral and metal resources  infrastructure projects  integrated transportation systems  chemicals  energy  food resources  food products and services  consumer services  innovation and corporate development.

organization_site: Visit the Mitsui O.S.K. Lines website
organization_description: Mitsui O.S.K. Lines engages in the provision of marine transport services. It operates through the following segments: dry bulk  energy transport  product transport  associated businesses and others. The dry bulk segment includes dry bulkers  oil tankers  LNG carriers and car carriers. The energy transport segment covers the tankers  steaming coal carriers  LNG carriers and offshore business. The product transport segment comprises of containerships  ferries and coastal RoRo ships. The associated businesses segment includes real estate  cruise ship  tug boats and trading. The others segment handles ship manoeuvring  management  shipping  finance and shipbuilding.

organization_site: Visit the Mizuho Financial Group website
organization_description: The Mizuho Financial Group offers a broad range of services  including banking  trust and securities  and other business related to financial services  through its group companies. The group has approximately 57 000 staff working in some 900 offices inside and outside Japan  and total assets of over $1.6 trillion (as of March 2016). Under the umbrella of the holding company Mizuho Financial Group  its major group companies include Mizuho Bank (MHBK)  Mizuho Trust & Banking (MHTB) and Mizuho Securities (MHSC).
Moelis & Company is a global  independent investment bank that provides innovative strategic advice and solutions to a diverse client base  including corporations  governments and financial sponsors.

organization_site: Visit the Mohammed Bin Salman Foundation (MiSK) website
organization_description: Prince Mohammed bin Salman bin Abdulaziz Foundation (the Misk Foundation) is a non-profit foundation established by H.R.H. Crown Prince Mohammad bin Salman in 2011 to discover  develop and empower Saudi youth to become active participants in the future economy. Misk enables the society to learn  develop and progress in business  literature and culture  and science and technology through establishing incubators and encouraging esteemed institutions to provide an attractive and stimulating environment. It pursues this agenda both through its own programmes  and through partnerships with local and global organizations.

organization_site: Visit the Mori Building Co. website
organization_description: Tokyo-based Mori Building Co.  established in 1959  creates ground-breaking concepts for urban living throughout Japan and the rest of Asia. As one of Japans leading urban landscape developers  Mori Building engages in urban redevelopment  real estate leasing and management and consultation covering areas such as leisure complexes  offices and high-class residences. The company is also involved in culture  art and town management activities  as well as planning and operating museums  galleries  observatories  educational and conference facilities  and private clubs.

For more than a century  MSD has been a global healthcare leader working to help the world be well. MSD is a tradename of Merck & Co.  based in Kenilworth  New Jersey  USA. Through prescription medicines  vaccines  biologic therapies  and animal health products  MSD works with customers and operates in more than 140 countries to deliver innovative health solutions. MSD also demonstrates its commitment to increasing access to healthcare through far-reaching policies  programmes and partnerships.

Founded in 1994  the MTN Group is a pan-African mobile and telecommunications operator. MTN is headquartered in Johannesburg  South Africa  and listed on the JSE Securities Exchange under share code MTN. MTN has 232 million mobile subscribers and 20 million mobile money subscribers throughout operations in Afghanistan  Benin  Botswana  Cameroon  Côte d’Ivoire  Cyprus  Ghana  Guinea Bissau  the Republic of Guinea  Iran  Liberia  Nigeria  the Republic of Congo (Congo-Brazzaville)  Rwanda  South Africa  Sudan  South Sudan  Swaziland  Syria  Uganda  Yemen and Zambia. MTN’s vision is to lead the delivery of a bold new digital world by building a best-in-class experience for customers.

MTR is regarded as one of the worlds leading railway operators. It was established in 1975 with a mission to construct and operate  under prudent commercial principles  an urban metro system to help meet Hong Kongs public transport requirements. Its rail network stretches 218 kilometres in total  including nine urban lines  the Airport Express and a light rail system in the New Territories. The network carries over 4 million passengers every weekday; its total patronage for 2011 was 1.6 billion.

Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG) is one of the worlds leading financial groups. Headquartered in Tokyo and with approximately 350 years of history  MUFG is a global network with over 2 000 offices in about 50 countries. The group has over 140 000 employees and about 300 entities  offering services including commercial banking  trust banking  securities  credit cards  consumer finance  asset management and leasing.

MultiChoice Group is a South Africa-based video entertainment company focused on providing video entertainment to various devices and subscribing households in South Africa and across sub-Saharan Africa. While channels and content are sourced globally  the company also produces/sources local content  develops content protection and access-management technologies for internet  pay television and mobile platforms. MultiChoice Group is the parent company of MultiChoice South Africa (including SuperSport  M-Net  and DStv Media Sales)  MultiChoice Africa Holdings  Showmax Africa  and Irdeto.

Nasdaq is among the worlds largest exchange companies. It delivers trading  exchange technology and public company services on six continents  with more than 3 400 listed companies. Offering multiple capital raising services to companies worldwide  it also supports trading in multiple asset classes  including equities  derivatives  debt  commodities  structured products and exchange-traded funds. It is both an exchange owner/operator and technology provider to more than 70 marketplaces worldwide.

Founded in 1915  Naspers is a global internet and entertainment group and one of the largest technology investors in the world. Operating in more than 130 countries and markets with long-term growth potential  Naspers builds leading companies that empower people and enrich communities. It runs some of the worlds leading platforms in internet  video entertainment and media. Naspers is listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange (NPN.SJ) and has an ADR listing on the London Stock Exchange (LSE: NPSN).

Naturgy is a multinational group operating in 30 countries and with over 18 million customers. It has an installed capacity of 15.57 GW and a leading position in the markets where it operates. With a net turnover of €24 billion in 2018  it is operating in 30 countries  including Spain  Mexico  Brazil  Chile  Argentina  Peru and Panama. It has 11 million customers  LNG sales in several countries worldwide  and 11 LNG tankers. It is an integrated gas and electricity company in Spain and a leader in gas distribution in Spain  with a market share of 69%.

NECs major operations are: Public Business  providing safe  secure and efficient social solutions for domestic and foreign governments  governmental agencies  public institutions  financial institutions and other organizations; Enterprise Business  providing information technology solutions to meet private sector demand centring on manufacturing and retail/services; Telecom Carrier Business  supplying equipment required for network implementation to telecom carriers  network control platform systems and operating services; and System Platform Business  providing products  including network equipment  computer equipment  software products and service platforms  and solutions and services.

NEOM is an accelerator of human progress and a vision of what a new future might look like. It is a region in northwest Saudi Arabia on the Red Sea being built from the ground up as a living. NEOM will include hyperconnected  cognitive cities  ports and enterprise zones  research centres  sports and entertainment venues  and tourist destinations. As a hub for innovation  entrepreneurs  business leaders and companies will come to research  incubate and commercialize new technologies and enterprises in groundbreaking ways. Residents of NEOM will embody an international ethos and embrace a culture of exploration  risk-taking and diversity.

Neusoft provides innovative information technology-enabled solutions and services to meet demands arising from social transformation  shape new lifestyles for individuals  and create value for society. Neusoft provides industry solutions  smart connected products  and platform and cloud and data services. Established in China in 1991  Neusoft has 20 000 employees worldwide  10 software research and development bases  a comprehensive marketing and service network covering more than 60 cities in China  and subsidiaries in the US  Japan  Europe and the Middle East  among others.

organization_site: Visit the New York Times website
organization_description: The New York Times is a media company that publishes the New York Times.

Newmont is a leading gold company and a producer of copper  silver  zinc and lead. The company’s portfolio of assets  prospects and talent is anchored in favourable mining jurisdictions in North America  South America  Australia and Africa. Newmont is the only gold producer listed in the S&P 500 Index and is widely recognized for its principled environmental  social and governance practices. The company is an industry leader in value creation  supported by robust safety standards  execution and technical proficiency. Newmont was founded in 1921 and has been publicly traded since 1925.

Nielsen is a broadly diversified audience measurement information company active in the markets for consumer and professional research and data. Its operations span the distribution of consumer retail  packaged goods  publishing  broadcasting and entertainment  educational publications  trade and professional magazines and databases.
Nikkei is active in newspaper publishing  TV stations – including Nikkei-CNBC – net news and radio stations.

Nomura is an Asia-based financial services group with an integrated global network spanning over 30 countries. By connecting markets East and West  Nomura services the needs of individuals  institutions  corporations and governments through its three business divisions: Retail  Asset Management and Wholesale (Global Markets and Investment Banking). Founded in 1925  the firm is built on a tradition of disciplined entrepreneurship  serving clients with creative solutions and considered thought leadership.
As one of the world’s largest providers of crop inputs and services  Nutrien plays a critical role in "Feeding the Future" by helping growers to increase food production in a sustainable manner.

NYSE Group is a subsidiary of Intercontinental Exchange (NYSE: ICE)  a leading operator of global exchanges and clearing houses  and a provider of data and listings services. NYSE Group includes exchanges  market data and connectivity services. The equity exchanges – the New York Stock Exchange  NYSE MKT and NYSE Arca – are among those that trade the most US equity volume. NYSE is a leading global venue for capital raising  leading worldwide in initial public offerings (IPOs)  including technology IPOs. NYSE Arca Options and NYSE Amex Options are leading equity options exchanges.

OCP Group is one of the largest phosphate and fertiliser companies in the world. It is based in Morocco and delivers products to more than 165 clients on five continents. It has a turnover of $6.5 billion  employs 20 000 people  and is engaged in a large-scale $12 billion investment programme over the next five years to expand capacity downstream.

Oerlikon is a global technology group with a clear mission: to become the leading provider of surface solutions  advanced materials and materials processing. Oerlikon engineers materials  equipment and surfaces and provides expert services to enable customers to have high-performance products and systems with extended lifespans. A leading global technology and engineering group  headquartered in Pfäffikon  Switzerland  Oerlikon operates its business in two divisions – Surface Solutions and Polymer Processing Solutions – and has 11 800 employees at 207 locations in 38 countries. In 2021  Oerlikon generated CHF2.6 billion in sales and invested CHF105 million in R&D.

organization_site: Visit the Olayan Financing Company website
organization_description: The Olayan Group is a private  multinational enterprise made up of more than 50 companies and affiliated businesses. Founded in 1947  it is both a long-term global investor and an operator of diversified businesses in Saudi Arabia and the wider Middle East.

Old Mutual Emerging Markets (OMEM) serves customers in Africa  Asia and Latin America. It aims to build a sustainable growth platform for the Old Mutual Group through investments in these high-growth emerging markets. OMEM helps customers and communities to achieve their lifetime financial goals by providing long-term savings  protection and investment solutions.

Omnicom Group is a leading global marketing and communications company. Its branded networks and specialty firms provide advertising  strategic media planning and buying  digital and interactive marketing  customer relationship management (CRM)  public relations and other specialty communications services to 5 000 clients in 100 countries. It manages a portfolio of market leaders comprised of global advertising agency networks BBDO  DDB and TBWA; leading national advertising agencies; over 200 marketing services companies under the DAS Group of Companies; and Omnicom Media Group.

organization_site: Visit the Ontario Teachers Pension Plan website
organization_description: Ontario Teachers Pension Plan is Canadas largest single-profession pension plan  with $227.7 billion in net assets. It pays pensions and invests plan assets on behalf of 318 000 working and retired teachers. Since its establishment as an independent organization in 1990  it has built an international reputation for innovation and leadership in investment management and member services. It employs 1 100 employees at its head office in Toronto  Canada  and investment offices in London and Hong Kong. Roughly 1 500 people work at its real estate subsidiary Cadillac Fairview.

The Ørsted vision is a world that runs entirely on green energy. Ørsted develops  constructs and operates offshore and onshore wind farms  solar farms  energy storage facilities and bioenergy plants  and provides energy products to its customers. It ranks as the world’s most sustainable energy company in the Corporate Knights 2021 index of the Global 100 most sustainable corporations in the world and is recognized on the CDP Climate Change A List as a global leader on climate action. Headquartered in Denmark  Ørsted employs more than 6 000 people.

PAG is one of Asias largest alternative investment management firms  with approximately $30 billion in funds under management in private equity  real estate and absolute return strategies. Since 2002  PAG has invested more than $45 billion in markets in Asia on behalf of some of the worlds largest institutional investors. PAG employs more than 350 people in offices in Asia and in key financial centres worldwide.

Panasonic changed corporate structure in April 2022 and is now a holding with companies underneath. Each company is an independent organization and responsible for its business unit. Panasonic Connect engages in the development  manufacturing and sale of devices and the provision of solutions  including system integration  installation  maintenance and repair services for the supply chain  public service  infrastructure and entertainment sectors.

PensionDanmark is Denmarks largest labour market pension fund and one of the 50 largest pension funds in Europe. It offers defined contribution pensions  insurance policies and healthcare schemes on the basis of collective agreements covering approx. 710 000 individuals employed in 26 000 companies in the private and public sectors. PensionDanmarks long-term investment objective is to ensure the highest possible buying power of members pension savings. As of end 2017  PensionDanmarks assets under management exceeded €36 billion.

Permira is a global investment firm that finds and backs successful businesses with ambition. Founded in 1985  the firm advises funds with a total committed capital of approximately €25 billion. Permira funds make long-term investments in companies with the ambition of transforming their performance and driving sustainable growth. In the past 30 years  Permira funds have made over 200 private equity investments in five key sectors: consumer  financial services  healthcare  industrial and technology. Permira employs over 200 people.

The Perot Companies comprise the various Perot family businesses  including real estate  oil and gas  and financial investments. Hillwood  a Perot company  was founded in 1988 and is ranked today as one of the top industrial  commercial and residential real estate developers in the United States.

PETRONAS  Malaysias integrated multinational petroleum corporation  has a presence in more than 30 countries around the world and over 30 years of experience in oil and gas operations. Its business activities range from upstream oil and gas exploration and production to downstream oil refining  the marketing and distribution of petroleum products  trading  gas processing and liquefaction  gas transmission pipeline operations  the marketing of liquefied natural gas  petrochemical manufacturing and marketing  shipping and property investment.

PG&E is among the largest investor-owned gas and electric utilities in the US. It is the third largest builder and operator of unregulated power plants in the US via the US Generating Company  a joint venture with the Bechtel Group.

Pladis  one of the fastest growing global snacking companies  was established in 2016 and is based in the United Kingdom. It has a workforce of 17 000 employees  with 34 factories in 13 countries and annual revenues of $5 billion. Its brands include McVitie’s  Ulker  GODIVA  Carr’s  BN  Verkade and Go Ahead.

Launched in March 2022 and anchored on its mission to serve as a future eco-friendly materials provider  POSCO Holdings manages POSCO Group’s business portfolio and models corporate governance and environmental  social and governance (ESG) management practices. The group comprises affiliated operating companies representing steel  chemicals  construction and trade industries. The largest operating company is steelmaker POSCO  serving as the backbone of national development for over 5 decades. In addition to steelmaking  POSCO Group focuses on new growth businesses such as rechargeable battery materials and hydrogen.

PPF was founded in the Czech Republic in 1991 as an investment fund and participated in the privatization of the countrys economy following the major social change that took place after 1989. PPF Group invests into multiple market segments  such as banking and financial services  telecommunications  real estate  retail  insurance  agriculture and biotechnology. Its reach spans from Europe to Russia  the USA and across Asia.

PZU is the parent company of entities making up the PZU Capital Group  the largest organization in the Polish insurance sector. The company has activities in life  non-life  and health insurance  as well as investments in pension  healthcare and banking products. It became a joint stock company in 1991 as a result of the transformation of Panstwowy Zaklad Ubezpieczen  owned by the Polish Treasury. The group includes the life insurance company PZU Zycie. PZU also operates in the Baltics and Ukraine.

organization_site: Visit the Qatar Financial Centre (QFC) website
organization_description: The Qatar Financial Centre (QFC) is an onshore business and financial centre providing a platform for firms to do business in Qatar and the region. It offers its own legal  regulatory  tax and business environment  which allows 100% foreign ownership and 100% repatriation of profit. QFC charges a competitive 10% corporate tax on locally sourced profits. The QFC was established by the Government of Qatar in 2005 and is designed to attract international banking  insurance and other financial services.

QI Group is a diversified multinational entity catering to various business lines in lifestyle and leisure  luxury  training and education  property development and management  logistics and e-commerce. The QI Group has more than 1 500 employees and offices in Asia  Europe and the Middle East  including subsidiaries in nearly 30 countries. It owns and operates Quest International University Perak (QIUP) in collaboration with the Malaysian State Government. It is also invested in the hospitality segment in Sri Lanka  Thailand  South Africa and Turkey via resorts and boutique hotels.

organization_site: Visit the RBC (Royal Bank of Canada) website
organization_description: RBC Financial Group is a provider of integrated financial services to personal and business clients in Canada and abroad.

Recruit Holdings is a Japan-based holding company founded in 1960. It provides information services globally. Recruit operates various platforms to match clients (enterprises) and users (people)  offering information on education  travel  beauty  housing  bridal  automobiles and dining  among others.

Repsol is a global multi-energy company that is leading the energy transition with its ambition of achieving zero net emissions by 2050. Present throughout the energy value chain  the company employs 24 000 people worldwide and distributes its products in nearly 100 countries to around 24 million customers. To achieve zero net emissions by 2050  Repsol is deploying an integrated decarbonization technology model based on enhanced efficiency  increased renewable power generation capacity  the production of low-carbon fuels  the development of new customer solutions  the circular economy  and by driving breakthrough projects to reduce the industrys carbon footprint.

Royal Golden Eagle (RGE) manages a group of companies focused on the resource-based manufacturing industries. Its products are transformed into end products that improve the daily lives of millions of people around the world. Assets held by RGE companies exceed $25 billion. Its group of companies has a combined workforce of 60 000 people worldwide. RGEs vision is to be one of the largest  best-managed and sustainable resource-based groups  creating value for the community  country  climate  customer and company.

Rio Tinto is a mining and metals company operating in 35 countries around the world. Its purpose is to produce the materials essential to human progress. Its four product groups bring this purpose to life: aluminium  copper  minerals and iron ore. These are complemented by its safety  technical and projects  strategy and development  and commercial groups  as well as its service and support functions.

RMZ Corp is one of Asias largest privately-owned real estate owners  investors and developers committed to building socially  economically and environmentally responsible assets and communities. It owned and operated a real asset portfolio of 6.2 million square metres in 2021  with a pipeline to achieve some 8 million square metres by 2026. It is among the only zero-debt real estate companies globally. It aims to become one of the worlds most respected and largest real estate players and to scale to a global portfolio of 32.5 million square metres by 2030.

The Bosch Group is a leading global supplier of technology and services. The company employs approximately 375 000 associates worldwide (as of 31 December 2015) and generated sales of €70.6 billion in 2015. Its operations are divided into four business sectors: mobility solutions  industrial technology  consumer goods  and energy and building technology. Including its sales and service partners  Bosch is represented in roughly 150 countries. This worldwide development  manufacturing and sales network is the foundation for further growth.

Rockwell Automation is a world-leading provider of industrial automation power  control and information solutions that help customers meet their manufacturing productivity objectives. The company is also a leading provider of contact management technologies and applications that help companies more efficiently manage interaction with their own customers. Headquartered in Milwaukee  USA  the company employs about 22 000 people serving customers in more than 80 countries. Rockwell Automations annual revenue for 2022 was $7.76 billion  a 10.9% increase from 2021.

Sabanci Holding is the parent company of the Sabanci Group  Turkeys leading industrial and financial conglomerate. Group companies are market leaders in their respective sectors  which include financial services  energy  cement  retail and industry. Listed on the Istanbul Stock Exchange (ISE)  Sabanci Holding has controlling interest in 10 companies that are also listed on the ISE.

Sanofi  an innovative global healthcare company  is driven by one purpose: chasing the miracles of science to improve people’s lives. Its team  spanning some 100 countries  is dedicated to transforming the practice of medicine by working to turn the impossible into the possible. Sanofi provides potentially life-changing treatment options and life-saving vaccine protection to millions of people globally  while putting sustainability and social responsibility at the centre of its ambitions.

organization_site: Visit the Saudi Arabian Mining Company (Maaden) website
organization_description: Saudi Arabian Mining Company (Maaden) is about to build a complex in Ras Al-Khair and is finalizing plans to build an integrated bauxite alumina aluminium complex that will be one of the largest investments ever undertaken in the aluminium industry. These projects are set to cost over $10.8 billion.

organization_site: Visit the Saudi Electricity Company (SEC) website
organization_description: Saudi Electricity is the largest in Middle East with 57 GW of generation  7.5 million customers  a 55 000 km transmission circuit. It is active in operations  generation maintenance  transmission and distribution. It has 33 000 employees.

organization_site: Visit the Serum Institute of India website
organization_description: Serum Institute of India is engaged in manufacturing and exporting life-saving immunobiologicals and has established itself as one of the worlds largest producers of measles and diphtheria  tetanus and pertussis vaccines. Its products have been used in 145 countries worldwide. The institute has a history of philanthropy.

ServiceNow is a cloud computing company with its headquarters in Santa Clara  California. ServiceNow is making the world of employment work better for people. Its cloud-based platform and solutions deliver digital workflows that create great experiences and unlock productivity for employees and the enterprise. ServiceNow is a software-as-a-service provider  providing technical management support  such as information technology (IT) service management  to the IT operations of large corporations  including providing help desk functionality. The companys core business revolves around the management of incident  problem and change IT operational events.

Shein is a global fashion and lifestyle e-retailer committed to making the beauty of fashion accessible to all. Shein uses on-demand manufacturing technology to connect suppliers to their agile supply chain  reducing inventory waste and enabling the company to deliver a variety of affordable products to customers around the world. From global offices  Shein reaches customers in more than 150 countries.

Founded in 1927 and headquartered in Lausanne  Switzerland  SICPA is a government provider of banknote security inks and secured identification  traceability and authentication solutions. With high-technology security inks at the core of its expertise  the company protects the majority of the worlds banknotes  security and value documents  and offers solutions and services to governments and industry  such as healthcare  ensuring product authentication  traceability and protection  as well as tax reconciliation  on a worldwide basis.

Siemens Energy is a global team of more than 91 000 dedicated employees. Together  the team is responsible for meeting growing energy demand while ensuring the climate is protected. It keeps the best of its 150-year legacy and pushes the boundaries of what is possible. Siemens Energy strives for sustainability on its decarbonization journey  innovation centred on future technologies  and transformation among future-focused offerings  portfolio and mindset. Together as one team across 90 countries  the company is committed to making sustainable  reliable and affordable energy possible. This is how it shapes the energy of tomorrow.

For over 120 years  Signify (formerly Philips Lighting) has been at the forefront of innovation. Signify uses the transformative power of light to make people more comfortable and productive – providing high-quality light in public places  professional spaces  and at home. Signify uses light to make people feel happier and safer – light that entertains  inspires and informs  makes cities more liveable  and satisfies peoples daily needs.

Silver Lake is an investment firm focused on large-scale investments in technology  technology-enabled and related growth industries. It seeks to achieve superior financial returns by investing with the strategic and operating insights of an experienced industry participant. The firms mission is to function as a value-added partner to the management teams of major technology franchises. Its portfolio includes or has included Avago  Avaya  Flextronics  Gartner  IPC Systems  NASDAQ  NetScout  NXP  Sabre  Serena  SunGard and Thomson.

organization_site: Visit the Singapore Economic Development Board website
organization_description: The Singapore Economic Development Board (EDB) is the lead government agency for planning and executing strategies to enhance Singapores position as a global business centre. EDB dreams  designs and delivers solutions that create value for investors and companies in Singapore. Its mission is to create sustainable economic growth with vibrant business and good job opportunities. EDBs home strategy articulates how it is positioning Singapore for the future  helping businesses improve their bottom line and grow their top line.

SkyBridge Capital is a global alternative investment firm. The firms suite of investment offerings for institutional and multidiscipline investors include commingled fund of hedge funds  customized separate account portfolios  hedge fund advisory services and a long-only mutual fund. The firm also produces the SkyBridge Alternatives (SALT) Conference and  through its media affiliate SkyBridge Media  has revived the iconic financial television programme "Wall Street Week". Headquartered in New York City  it has offices in Palm Beach Gardens  Florida  Zurich and Seoul.

SM Investments is one of the largest conglomerates in the Philippines  with interests in retail  banking  shopping malls  property development  hotels and resorts. It went public in 2005 and has several publicly listed companies: SM Prime Holdings  BDO Unibank  China Banking Corporation and Belle Corporation.

SNC-Lavalin Group is an engineering and construction group offering engineering  procurement  construction (EPC); engineering  procurement and construction management (EPCM)  and operations and maintenance (O&M) contract services. SNC-Lavalin also offers project financing  structural mechanical  electrical  instrumentation and piping contract services. The group offers services to industries including power  oil and gas  environment and water  social infrastructure  mining and metallurgy  industrial  and transportation. Its operations are spread throughout North America  the Middle East and Africa  Latin America  Europe and Asia-Pacific. The group is headquartered in West Montreal  Quebec  Canada. It has annual sales of $7.1 billion and total assets of $8.9 billion.

Solvay is an advanced materials and specialty chemicals company committed to developing chemistry that addresses key societal challenges. It innovates and partners with customers worldwide in many end-markets. Its products are used in planes  cars  batteries  smart and medical devices  as well as in mineral and oil and gas extraction  enhancing efficiency and sustainability. Solvay is headquartered in Brussels and has 27 000 employees in 62 countries. Net sales were €10.3 billion in 2018. Solvay (SOLB.BE) is listed on Euronext Brussels and Paris (Bloomberg: SOLB.BB; Reuters: SOLB.BR) and in the US its shares (SOLVY) are traded through a level-1 ADR programme.

Sompo is mainly engaged in the businesses of property and casualty (P&C) insurance  life insurance  nursing care  and healthcare. It is one of the largest insurance groups in Japan. To realize its brand slogan – “A Theme Park for Security  Health & Wellbeing” – Sompo aims to bring happiness into customers’ lives by solving social problems through its businesses. It is developing business globally with a business network that covers North America  Europe  the Middle East  Africa  Asia  Latin America and Oceania.

Splunk helps organizations around the world turn data into doing. Splunk technology is designed to investigate  monitor  analyse and act on data at any scale. Its powerful platform and unique approach to data have empowered companies to mitigate risk  improve service levels  reduce operations costs  enhance collaboration between development and operations and create new product and service offerings.

organization_site: Visit the State Grid Corporation of China website
organization_description: State Grid was established in 2002 to carry out state-authorized investments and as a pilot state holding company. As one of the largest utilities in the world  State Grid ranks second on the Fortune Global 500. State Grid constructs and operates power grids as its core business. Its mission is to provide safer  cleaner and more economical and sustainable power. State Grid has RMB536.3 billion in registered capital and 1.72 million employees  providing power to 1.1 billion people in 26 provinces  autonomous regions and municipalities.

organization_name: State Oil Fund of the Republic of Azerbaijan (SOFAZ)
organization_site: Visit the State Oil Fund of the Republic of Azerbaijan (SOFAZ) website
organization_description: SOFAZ is a sovereign wealth fund located in the Republic of Azerbaijan. Its mission is to transform depletable hydrocarbon (oil and gas) reserves into financial assets generating perpetual income for current and future generations and the financing of strategically important infrastructure and social projects of national scale to ensure the representation of the country in international agreements on joint exploration of natural resources.

State Street is a leading specialist in servicing sophisticated investors worldwide  including investment managers  corporations  public pension funds  unions  not-for-profit organizations and high-net-worth individuals. It provides an integrated range of services  such as accounting  administration  daily pricing  investment management  securities lending  foreign exchange  trading and information services. It is focused on growing globally and leveraging its advantages in technology and electronic financial services.

STC Group is a pioneer digital enabler and integrated telecommunication services provider in the Middle East and North Africa region. STC is a leading operator in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia  with an international presence in 11 countries serving more than 170 million customers. STC has a long history of industry leadership in services. The group was among the first in the region to launch 5G networks and was considered one of the fastest globally in deploying 5G networks as it had already deployed around 6 500 5G towers. STC Group provides telecom and digital services in Saudi Arabia  Bahrain and Kuwait.

Sumitomo is one of the worlds leading traders and a distributor of a wide range of commodities  industrial goods and consumer goods. It is increasingly active as an investor in a diverse range of businesses that mesh with existing operations or that position the company in markets with long-term growth potential. It has 22 domestic offices and 114 overseas branches.

organization_site: Visit the Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group (SMFG) website
organization_description: Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group (SMFG) is the holding company for Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation (SMBC)  Sumitomo Mitsui Finance and Leasing  SMBC Nikko Securities  Sumitomo Mitsui Card  Japan Research Institute  and others. SMFG is one of three mega-bank groups in Japan  with consolidated total assets amounting to ¥183 trillion as of March 2015. The group offers securities  credit cards  leasing and consumer finance services. SMFG has more than 68 000 employees worldwide and owns subsidiaries in many countries and regions.

Sysco is a multinational corporation involved in marketing and distributing food products  smallware  kitchen equipment and tabletop items to restaurants  healthcare and educational facilities  hospitality businesses  and wholesale to other companies that provide foodservice (like Aramark and Sodexo). The company is headquartered in Houston  Texas. Sysco  an acronym for Systems and Services Company  is one of the worlds largest broadline food distributors; it has more than 600 000 clients. Management consulting is also an integral part of its services. The company operates 330 distribution facilities worldwide; providing service to over 90 countries.

The Tamer Group has come a long way since 1922 when Mohammed Said Tamer established the first pharmacy in Saudi Arabia. Today  it is a leader in healthcare  nutrition  wellness and beauty care  responding to the growing needs of the Saudi and Middle East communities. Headquartered in Jeddah  Saudi Arabia  Tamer Group represents many of the worlds leading companies through various agreements  partnerships and joint ventures. The group has a majority shareholding in SAJA with Daiichi Sankyo Co. and Astellas Pharma.

Tata Sons is the investment holding company of the Tata group. The Tata group comprises over 100 operating companies in seven business sectors: communications and information technology (IT)  engineering  materials  services  energy  consumer products and chemicals. The group has operations in more than 100 countries on six continents  and its companies export products and services to 150 countries. Total revenue was $107 billion in 2014-15  with 67% coming from business outside India. Tata companies employ over 600 000 people worldwide.

TCL is one of the largest consumer electronics enterprises in China  incorporated in 1981. In 2015  its global revenues exceeded RMB100 billion and its brand  which ranks among the top 10 most valuable Chinese brands  was valued at RMB71 billion. It operates sales offices  manufacturing sites and R&D facilities in over 40 countries around the world.

organization_site: Visit the TD Bank Group website
organization_description: The Toronto-Dominion Bank and its subsidiaries  collectively known as TD Bank Group (TD)  is headquartered in Toronto  Canada  and has 90 000 employees worldwide. TD offers a full range of financial products and services to 26 million customers worldwide through three key business lines: Canadian Retail  including TD Canada Trust  Business Banking  TD Auto Finance (Canada)  TD Wealth (Canada)  TD Direct Investing and TD Insurance; U.S. Retail  including TD Bank  America’s Most Convenient Bank  TD Auto Finance (U.S.)  TD Wealth (U.S.) and TD’s investment in Schwab; Wholesale Banking  including TD Securities. TD had C$1.7 trillion in assets on 31 January 2021.

Technogym is a world leading company in the wellness and fitness field. It has over 2 200 employees  14 branches in Europe  the US  Asia  the Middle East and Australia  and exports 90% of its production to 100 countries. Its equipment is used in more than 55 000 wellness centres and 100 000 private homes. It spearheaded the wellness concept globally. It has been an official and exclusive supplier to the 2016 Rio Games and the five previous Olympic Games.

Telefónica is a world-leading integrated operator in the telecommunication sector  providing communication  information and entertainment solutions  with a presence in Europe and Latin America. It operates in 24 countries. As of December 2013  its total number of customers amounted to 323.1 million. The company has one of the most international profiles in the sector  with more than 77% of its business outside its home market  and is a reference point in the Spanish and Portuguese speaking market.

Telenor Group is a leading telecommunications company in the Nordic countries and Asia  with 180 million customers and annual sales of around $12 billion (2019). It is committed to responsible business conduct and driven by the ambition of empowering societies. Connectivity has been Telenors domain for more than 160 years; its purpose is to connect customers to what matters most. Telenor is listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange under the ticker TEL.

Teneo is a global advisory firm providing strategic counsel across the full range of key objectives and issues to chief executive officers and leaders of some of the largest and most complex companies.

Thai Beverage is a leading beverage producer and distributor in South-East Asia and among the largest in Thailand. The company’s vision is to be a stable and sustainable ASEAN leader in beverage and food business. The business comprises four segments – spirits  beer  non-alcoholic beverages and food. ThaiBev is one of the top 10 largest companies on the Singapore Exchange by market capitalization and a constituent of the Straits Times Index. It is also recognized on the Dow Jones Sustainability Indices (DJSI) World indices in the beverage industry and part of the DJSI World family and DJSI Emerging Markets family.

In January 2017  LEGO Brand Group was established as a virtual entity within the KIRKBI Group to protect  develop and leverage the full potential of the brand in the longer term and to ensure active and engaged family ownership of branded entities through generations. The brand  driven by the LEGO Group  has developed rapidly. The LEGO Brand Group sets the long-term direction for the development of the brand within the entire ecosystem.

TotalEnergies is a broad energy company that produces and markets energies on a global scale: oil and biofuels  natural gas and green gases  renewables and electricity. Its 105 000 employees are committed to energy that is ever more affordable  clean  reliable and accessible to as many people as possible. Active in more than 130 countries  TotalEnergies puts sustainable development in all its dimensions at the heart of its projects and operations to contribute to the well-being of people.

Trip.com Group was founded in 1999 in Shanghai  China. The company is a leading provider of travel services  including accommodation reservation  transportation ticketing  packaged tours and corporate travel management. Trip.com Groups market cap has grown by more than 30 times since its listing on the NASDAQ Stock Exchange in 2003. In 2014  the companys gross transaction value reached $24.5 billion and total commission revenue reached $1.3 billion.

UniCredit is a pan-European Commercial Bank offering services in Italy  Germany and Central and Eastern Europe. Its purpose is to empower communities to progress and unlock the potential of its clients and people across Europe. It serves 15 million customers worldwide. They are at the heart of what UniCredit does in all its markets. UniCredit is organized in four core regions and two product factories  Corporate and Individual Solutions. This allows it to be close to clients and use the scale of the entire group to develop and offer the best products across all its markets.
Founded by five partners  Unison Capital is a private equity firm based in Tokyo. Since 1998  it has invested in a variety of Japanese companies.

Vale is a global mining company with headquarters in Brazil and operations in more than 30 countries  present on all five continents. Vale is a leader in the production of iron ore and the second largest producer of nickel. Vales mission is to transform natural resources into prosperity and sustainable development.

VARO Energy is an energy company operating throughout the complete downstream fuel supply chain with refining  storage  blending  distribution  sales and marketing assets. It delivers high-quality fuels from fossil and renewable sources to its national and international business customers and end-consumers. The company comprises three core business areas: Refining  Storage and Logistics  and Distribution and Sales. It sources crude oil for refineries in Bavaria  Germany  and Cressier  Switzerland  where it manufactures products such as gasoline  diesel and heating oil. Then  it transports  stores and distributes them to customers in Benelux  France  Germany and Switzerland.

Vattenfall is a European energy company with 19 000 employees. For more than 100 years it has electrified industries  supplied energy to peoples homes and modernized the way of living through innovation and cooperation. It is determined to enable fossil-free living within one generation. To succeed the company must become fossil-free itself. Vattenfall is also looking beyond its own industry to see where it can really make a difference. Together with partners  it is taking on the responsibility to find new and sustainable ways to electrify transportation  industries and heating. Vattenfalls main markets are Sweden  Germany  Netherlands  Denmark and the United Kingdom.
Vedanta Resources is a major Indian aluminium  copper  zinc and lead producer active in India  Africa and Australia. In 2008  it had revenues of $8.2 billion and an EBITDA of $3 billion.

For more than 80 years  the VELUX Group has created better living environments for people around the world  making the most of daylight and fresh air through the roof. Its product programme includes roof windows and modular skylights  decorative blinds  sun screening products and roller shutters  as well as installation and smart home solutions. These products help to ensure a healthy and sustainable indoor climate  for work and learning  for play and pleasure. It works globally – with sales and manufacturing operations in more than 36 countries and 12 500 employees worldwide. The VELUX Group is owned by VKR Holding.

Vestas wind turbines deliver clean energy that supports the global fight against climate change. Wind power from its 52 700 wind turbines currently reduces carbon dioxide emissions by over 60 million tonnes every year  while at the same time building energy security and independence. Vestas has delivered wind energy in 73 countries  providing jobs for around 19 300 people at service and project sites  research facilities  factories and offices all over the world. It has 64 GW of installed capacity worldwide.

organization_site: Visit the Viking Global Investors website
organization_description: Viking Global Investors is a global asset management firm that conducts fundamental  research-intensive stock selection in all industries. It was founded in 1999 and manages capital in excess of $30 billion.

Volvo Cars has manufacturing bases in the US  Europe and China  with the majority of its sales in Europe. Its 2021 revenues were $27 billion. It aims to be climate neutral by 2040 and to have 50% of sales from electric cars by 2025 and 100% by 2030. Volvo Cars is owned by Geely Holding. Volvo Cars owns 49.5% of Polestar  30% of Lynk&Co. Together with ECARX  it owns HaleyTek and together with Northvolt it owns NOVO Energy. Its headquarters are based in Gothenburg  Sweden. It also has main offices in New Jersey  USA and Shanghai  China.

Wal-Mart Stores (NYSE: WMT) helps people around the world save money and live better  in retail stores  online and through their mobile devices. The company’s legal name became Walmart Inc.  effective on 1 February 2018  to reflect its growing status as an omni-channel retailer. Each week  over 260 million customers and members visit its more than 11 600 stores under nearly 60 banners in 28 countries and e-commerce websites. With fiscal year 2017 revenue of $485.9 billion  Walmart employs approximately 2.3 million associates worldwide. Walmart continues to be a leader in sustainability  corporate philanthropy and employment opportunity.

Wesfarmers is one of Australias largest listed companies and among the largest employers outside the government. Its business operations include supermarkets  department stores  home improvement and office supplies  coal mining  energy  chemicals and fertilisers  and industrial and safety products.

Western Digital is driving the innovation needed to help customers capture  preserve  access and transform an ever-increasing diversity of data. Its solutions are at the heart of breakthrough discoveries and enable the flow of information that leads to smarter decisions and deeper connections. It creates environments for data to thrive so people  relationships and experiences thrive. Western Digital solutions are marketed under the G-Technology  HGST  SanDisk  Tegile  Upthere and WD brands.

Incorporated in Tianjin  China  in 2016  Accumulus is the largest online human resources company in China  providing over 83 million workers in new forms of employment (freelancers) with flexible employment services  such as compliance risk control audit  tax agency  business general contracting and subcontracting  income verification and settlement  as well as commercial insurance protection  and ranking No. 411 in Top 500 Enterprises of China  covering 120 countries and regions.

Zenith Bank is among Nigeria’s largest banks by tier-1 capital and one of Africa’s largest banks  with over $24 billion in assets and shareholder funds of over $3 billion as at June 2022. Founded in 1990  Zenith Bank is a global brand listed on the London Stock Exchange and the Nigerian Stock Exchange. With operations across Nigeria  the United Kingdom  the United Arab Emirates  several West African countries and a Representative Office in China  the bank has consistently provided its customers with best-in-class services in private  corporate and investment banking.

Zoom Video Communications is a remote conferencing services company headquartered in San Jose  California. It provides a remote conferencing service that combines video conferencing  online meetings  chat and mobile collaboration. Its mission is to develop a people-centric cloud service that transforms the real-time collaboration experience and improves the quality and effectiveness of communications forever.

organization_site: Visit the Abdul Latif Jameel website
organization_description: Abdul Latif Jameel is a diversified business of independent entities that include automotive distribution  auto parts manufacturing  financial services  renewable energy  environmental services  health  land and real estate development  logistics  electronics retailing and media services. Established in 1945 Abdul Latif Jameel has dual headquarters in Jeddah  Saudi Arabia and Dubai  United Arab Emirates  and currently has operations in 30 countries employing approximately 11 000 people from more than 40 nations.

organization_site: Visit the Aboitiz Equity Ventures website
organization_description: Aboitiz Equity Ventures is an integrated logistics company in the Philippines providing services for the movement of people and products under the brand names SuperFerry and 2GO  respectively. It is active in express cargo  logistics and supply chain management  crewing  chartering  ship management and passenger services.

organization_site: Visit the Abu Dhabi National Oil Company (ADNOC) website
organization_description: Abu Dhabi National Oil Company (ADNOC) is one of the worlds leading energy producers and a primary catalyst for the growth and diversification of the Abu Dhabi economy. With a production capacity of more than 4 million barrels of oil per day and around 11.5 billion cubic feet of natural gas per day  it operates across the entire hydrocarbon value chain. It has a network of fully-integrated businesses for exploration  production  storage  refining and trading  as well as the development of a wide range of petrochemical products.

ACWA Power is a developer  investor  co-owner and operator of a portfolio of power generation and desalinated water production plants  with operations in 12 countries in the Middle East and North Africa  Southern Africa and South-East Asia. ACWA Power’s portfolio  with an investment value in excess of $23.5 billion  can generate 16.1 GW of power and produce 2.5 million cubic meters per day of desalinated water to be delivered on a bulk basis to state utilities and industrial majors on long-term offtake contracts under public-private partnership  concession and utility service outsourcing models.

Established in 2018  ADQ is an Abu Dhabi-based investment and holding company with a broad portfolio of major enterprises. Its investments span key sectors of the diversified economy of the United Arab Emirates  including energy and utilities  food and agriculture  healthcare and life sciences  and mobility and logistics. As a strategic partner of Abu Dhabi’s government  ADQ is committed to accelerating the transformation of the Emirate into a globally competitive and knowledge-based economy.

Advantage Partners provides services to private equity and similar funds focused on Japanese and Asian markets. Founded in 1992 by Taisuke Sasanuma and Richard Folsom  it has been providing services to funds since 1997 when the firm established the first buyout fund in Japan. Funds served by Advantage Partners have invested in more than 50 companies  representing total invested capital of ¥300 billion across a wide range of industries and sectors. Advantage Partners has offices in Tokyo and Hong Kong.

Aegons core business is life insurance and related pension  financial and investment products. It is also active in health and property and casualty insurance  where these sectors offer prospects for long-term profitability and strengthen the position of its distribution networks. Consistent with a policy of spreading risks to achieve reliable performance  Aegon seeks to maintain a good balance of businesses within the group  both geographically and among and within product groups.
AES is a global power company that owns a portfolio of generation and distribution energy businesses in 30 countries.

Agilent Technologies (NYSE: A) is a global leader in the life sciences  diagnostics and applied chemical markets  delivering insight and innovation that advance the quality of life. Agilent’s full range of solutions includes instruments  software  services and expertise that provide trusted answers to its customers most challenging questions. The company generated revenue of $6.32 billion in fiscal 2021 and employs 17 000 people worldwide.

organization_site: Visit the Agricultural Bank of China website
organization_description: Agricultural Bank of China is a major integrated financial service provider in China  established in 1951. Listed on the SSE and the HKEX  it has a comprehensive business portfolio  an extensive distribution network and a leading technology platform. It offers corporate and retail banking products and services and financial market and asset management services. As of the end of 2022  the bank had 22 788 domestic branches  13 overseas branches and 4 overseas representative offices. As of 2022  Agricultural Bank of China had assets of RMB33 927.5 billion  operating income of RMB724.9 billion  net profits of RMB258.7 billion and customer deposits of RMB25 121 billion.

A world leader in gases  technologies and services for industry and health  Air Liquide is present in 80 countries. Its approximately 68 000 employees serve more than 3 million customers and patients. Oxygen  nitrogen and hydrogen are essential small molecules for life  matter and energy. They embody Air Liquides scientific territory and have been at the core of the companys activities since its creation in 1902.

organization_site: Visit the Al Nowais Investments website
organization_description: Al Nowais Investments is a private regional holding company headquartered in Abu Dhabi  United Arab Emirates. The group has evolved from a local business into a broad-based company in multiple markets with a turnover close to AED3.5 billion  more than 6 000 employees  leading market positions  and regional reach. Its diverse operations include the following core segments: fast-moving consumer goods; healthcare; information and communications technologies; engineering and contracting; oil; gas; energy services; electrical  mechanical and building material industries; real estate; hospitality; project development.

organization_site: Visit the Alberta Investment Management Corporation (AIMCo) website
organization_description: The Alberta Investment Management Corporation (AIMCo) is a Crown corporation  owned by the Province of Alberta  and one of Canadas largest and most diversified institutional investment managers. AIMCo was established on 1 January 2008 with a mandate to provide superior long-term investment results for its clients and operates independently from the Government of Alberta. With assets under management of approximately $100 billion  AIMCo invests globally on behalf of 32 Alberta-based pension  endowment and government funds  including the Alberta Heritage Savings Trust Fund.

Algebris Investments is a global asset management company operating long-only  hedged and private debt investment strategies. The firm has invested in the capital structure of financial institutions in equity and credit  with a specialization in the global financial sector. It recently expanded its expertise into global macro  non-financial credit and multi-asset strategies. In private debt  Algebris buys non-performing loans secured by real estate assets in Italy.

Algihaz Holding is a diversified Saudi Arabian conglomerate providing integrated solutions for conventional and renewable energy  Infrastructure onshore and offshore projects. Algihaz Holding is fully aligned with the Saudi Vision 2030  a bold and ambitious drive to reduce Saudi Arabia’s dependence on hydrocarbon exports and build a broad-based economy for a sustainable future. Its strategic investments and continuous development of its people reflect its strong commitment to the leadership transformation plans outlined in Vision 2030. Al Gihaz cherishes the global endeavors to achieve the energy transition and relentlessly aspires to contribute to such endeavors to the best of its capabilities and capacities.

organization_site: Visit the Alliance Global Group website

organization_description: Alsara Investment Group is an international private investment company focused on the luxury and well-being sector. It owns the Oktein  Adorisa  Akoni  Bidayat and Khrisjoy brands  with seven other acquisitions in play. The group has over $2 billion in assets under management and focuses primarily on markets in the Middle East  North Africa and Europe.

The Alshaya Group is a family company founded in Kuwait in 1890. It is a franchise operator for over 70 retail brands  including Mothercare  H&M  Debenhams  American Eagle Outfitters  Payless Shoes  Pottery Barn  Starbucks  Dean & Deluca and P.F.Changs. It is active in fashion and footwear  food  health and beauty  pharmaceuticals  optics and home furnishings. It has over 3 000 stores across the Middle East  North Africa  Russia  Turkey and Europe and employs more than 46 000 people.

Amanat Holdings was established and listed on the Dubai Financial Market (DFM) in November 2014  with an authorized capital of AED5 billion and a paid-up capital of AED2.5 billion. Amanat is establishing a portfolio of high-quality healthcare and education companies that are distinctive  differentiated and competitively sustainable. It delivers sound  disciplined and sustainable returns to investors and enhances the development of these sectors. Amanat only invests in three areas: growth and buyout opportunities; real estate requirements of operators; strategic ventures to address gaps.

organization_site: Visit the Amara Raja Group website
organization_description: Amara Raja Batteries is a manufacturer of lead-acid storage batteries for industrial and automotive applications in India. The companys products are supplied to various user segments  such as telecoms  railways  power control  solar and uninterruptible power supply (UPS) under the industrial battery business  and to automobile original equipment manufacturers (OEMs)  replacement market and private label customers under the automotive battery business. It also provides installation  commissioning and maintenance services. Its industrial and automotive batteries are exported to Singapore  Malaysia  Hong Kong  Thailand  Indonesia  Viet Nam  Taiwan  Philippines  Tanzania and South Africa  among others.

Amcor is one of the worlds largest manufacturers of consumer packaging  at $13.4 billion in annual revenues  and is on the Forbes Global 2000 list. The company is focused on making packaging that is increasingly lightweight  recyclable  reusable and uses a growing amount of recycled content across food  beverage  pharma and personal care products. Amcor’s 48 000 people are responsible for operations that span about 250 locations in more than 40 countries. In 2019  Amcor was recognized four times at Dows Packaging Innovation Awards for improving sustainability outcomes and enhancing consumer convenience across a range of packaging products.

América Móvil provides wireless services in Latin America. It has operations in 18 countries in the Americas  more than 265 million mobile customers  more than 31 million fixed lines and 19 million fixed broadband accesses. Spun off from Telefonos de Mexico in 2000  it has become a leading wireless telephone provider in Latin America by pioneering prepaid phone cards and subsidized handsets in the region.

organization_site: Visit the American Heart Association website
organization_description: The American Heart Association is the oldest and largest voluntary organization dedicated to fighting heart disease and stroke in the United States. Founded by six cardiologists in 1924  the organization includes 22.5 million volunteers and supporters. It funds innovative research  fights for stronger public health policies  and provides critical tools and information to save and improve lives. It includes 156 local offices and more than 3 000 employees. The American Stroke Association  created as a division in 1997  brings together the organizations stroke-related activities.

All Nippon Airways (ANA) has provided air transport since 1952. It has the largest route network in Japan and is ranked among the worlds 20 largest airlines in terms of total passengers. Its international route network provides balanced coverage of Asia  Europe and North America  making it a major airline group on a global scale. It has 240 aircraft  operates 1 082 flights per day on domestic routes in Japan and 938 flights per week on overseas routes  and is a leading member of Star Alliance.

Animoca Brands  a Deloitte Tech Fast winner and ranked in the Financial Times list of High Growth Companies Asia-Pacific 2021  is a leader in digital entertainment  blockchain and gamification. It develops and publishes a broad portfolio of products  including the REVV token and SAND token; original games such as The Sandbox  Crazy Kings  and Crazy Defense Heroes; and products using popular intellectual properties including Disney  WWE  Snoop Dogg  The Walking Dead  Power Rangers  MotoGP and Formula E. The company has multiple subsidiaries  including The Sandbox  Blowfish Studios  Quidd  GAMEE  nWay  Pixowl  Bondly  Lympo  and Grease Monkey Games.

APCO Worldwide is an award-winning  independently owned global communication  public affairs and stakeholder engagement consultancy with more than 30 offices in major business  political and media capitals throughout the Americas  Europe  the Middle East  Africa and Asia. Headquartered in Washington DC  it offers services related to business  industry and finance; traditional and social media  public opinion and society; and government and public policy. The firm was founded in 1984 and is a majority women-owned business.

organization_name: Apex-Brasil (Brazilian Trade and Investment Promotion Agency)
organization_site: Visit the Apex-Brasil (Brazilian Trade and Investment Promotion Agency) website
organization_description: The Brazilian Trade and Investment Promotion Agency (Apex-Brasil) works to promote Brazilian products and services abroad and to attract foreign direct investment to strategic sectors of the Brazilian economy. Its efforts comprise trade and prospective missions  business round tables  support for the participation of Brazilian companies in major international trade fairs  arranging technical visits by foreign buyers and opinion-makers to learn about Brazils productive structure  and other activities designed to strengthen the countrys branding abroad.

organization_site: Visit the APG Asset Management website
organization_description: APG provides pension fund administration  asset management  management support and communication services to Dutch pension funds. For these pension funds and their 4.5 million active and retired participants from the public and private sectors  representing over 30% of all collective pension schemes in the Netherlands  APG manages pension assets of approximately €430 billion (as at April 2015) and has locations in Amsterdam  New York  Hong Kong and Heerlen.

organization_site: Visit the Apollo Hospitals Enterprise website
organization_description: It was in 1983 that Prathap Reddy made a pioneering endeavour by launching India’s first corporate hospital – Apollo Hospitals – in Madras (now known as Chennai). As one of the foremost integrated healthcare groups in Asia  its presence includes 9 834 beds in 69 hospitals  3 250 pharmacies  over 200 primary care and diagnostic clinics  more than 150 telemedicine centres and branches spanning the length and breadth of the country.

Ariston Group is a global leader in sustainable thermal comfort  offering solutions for hot water and space heating  and components and burners. Ariston Group has more than 10 000 employees  representative offices in 43 countries  31 production sites  and 30 research and development centres on 5 continents; since November 2021  it is listed on Euronext Milan and  in 2021  reported almost €2 billion in revenues  exclusive of recent acquisitions Chromagen and CENTROTEC Climate Systems. It demonstrates its commitment to sustainability through the development of renewable and high-efficiency solutions  such as heat pumps  water heating heat pumps  hybrid solutions  solar thermal systems  and domestic ventilation.

Arup is the creative force at the heart of many of the worlds most prominent projects in the built environment and throughout industry. From more than 90 offices worldwide  some 12 000 planners  designers  engineers and consultants deliver innovative projects around the globe.

Astra is on a mission to launch a new generation of space services to observe  connect and improve life on Earth. Founded in October 2016 and located in San Francisco  California  Astra developing a vertically integrated  massively scalable launch platform to capture a large piece of the space economy as it grows from $500 billion to $3 trillion annually over the coming decades. It is a software-driven aerospace company combining proprietary software automation and vertical design  manufacturing and testing integration  reducing launch costs. Astra completed two of three test launches within two years of inception.

Astranis is a developer of a new satellite technology that aims to transmit data down to specific terrestrial locations with each satellite it launches. The companys mission is to help get the 4 billion people who are without internet access online. It was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in San Francisco  California.

Augury is building a world where people can always rely on the machines that matter. Augury supports its customers by enabling digital transformation through superior insights into the health and performance of the machines they use to make products  deliver services and improve lives.

Aurobindo Pharma is ranked among the top 10 generic pharma companies in the world and is an integrated large global pharmaceutical company with a presence in over 155 countries  with planned expansion in new territories such as Poland  Italy  Spain  Czech Republic  Portugal and France. Aurobindo’s marketing partners include Astra Zeneca and Pfizer. The company’s area of activity includes six major therapeutic/product areas: antibiotics  anti-retrovirals  cardiovascular products  central nervous system products  gastroenterologicals  and anti-allergics. Aurobindo Pharma plans to expand its product portfolio with high-value products in oncology  hormones  biosimilars and novel drug delivery solutions like depot injections  inhalers  patches and films.

organization_site: Visit the Automatic Data Processing (ADP) website
organization_description: Automatic Data Processing (ADP) offers onsite  online and remote (batch) computing and information services: payroll  accounting  brokerage processing  commodity futures trading  financial information  automotive dealer information  inventory control  collision repair estimates and other services.

Avison Young (Canada) provides real estate services. The company offers consulting  advisory  lease administration  investment and asset management  and mortgage services. Avison Young (Canada) serves customers worldwide.

Axis Bank is a private sector bank in India. The bank offers the entire spectrum of financial services to customer segments covering large and mid-sized businesses  micro-  small and medium-sized enterprises  agriculture and retail businesses. The bank has 4 594 domestic branches with 11 333 ATMs and 5 710 cash recyclers spread across the country as at 31 March 2021. It has 6 virtual centres and over 1 500 virtual relationship managers. Its overseas operations are spread over eight international offices  with branches in Singapore  Dubai (at DIFC) and Gift City-IBU; representative offices at Dhaka  Dubai  Abu Dhabi  Sharjah and an overseas subsidiary in London.

Ayala is one of the oldest and most respected business groups in the Philippines. It was founded in 1834 and listed on the Philippine Stock Exchange in 1976. It regularly ranks among the top companies on the Philippine Stock Exchange in terms of market capitalization. The group has a diverse range of business interests  including large-scale real estate development  banking and financial services  telecommunications  water distribution infrastructure  electronics manufacturing services  an automotive dealership  business process outsourcing  and various international real estate investments.

Aydem Enerji operates in the fields of electricity generation  distribution and retail  with a groundbreaking approach in the energy sector in Turkey. With a 40-year history and more than 12 000 employees  its socially and environmentally friendly stance  it is transforming energy into an innovative power to make today and the future brighter. As a leading energy company it Turkey  Aydem Enerji focuses on renewable energy while working for the sustainable future of the country. The company produces energy using the resources of the country.

Bahrain Petroleum has activities in the oil industry  including exploration and prospecting for oil  drilling  production  refining  distribution of petroleum products and natural gas  and sales and exports of crude oil and refined products. Wholly owned by the government of Bahrain  it owns a refinery  storage facilities  a marketing terminal and a marine terminal for its petroleum products. Its customers are based in the Middle East  India  the Far East  South-East Asia and Africa.

Bain Capital is a leading private investment firm with approximately $160 billion of assets under management. It creates lasting impact for its investors  teams  businesses and local communities. Since its founding in 1984  it has applied its insight and experience to organically expand into several asset classes  including private equity  credit  public equity  venture capital and real estate. It leverages its shared platform to capture cross-asset class opportunities in strategic areas of focus. With offices on four continents  Bain Capital’s global team aligns its interests with those of its investors for lasting impact.

Baker Hughes is an international industrial service company and one of the worlds largest oil field services companies. The company provides the oil and gas industry with products and services for oil drilling  formation evaluation  completion  production and reservoir consulting. It is an energy technology company that provides solutions for energy and industrial customers worldwide. Built on a century of experience and with operations in over 120 countries and headquarters in Houston  Texas  it has 68 000 employees and annual revenues of $24 billion  spread between oilfield services (54%)  oilfield equipment (12%)  turbomachinery and processing (23%)  digital solutions (11%).

Baker McKenzie is a corporate law firm covering a full range of legal services  including antitrust and competition; banking and finance; capital markets; compliance and investigations; digital transformation; dispute resolution; employment and compensation; sustainability and energy transition; intellectual property and technology; international commercial and trade; mergers and acquisitions; private equity; real estate; restructuring and insolvency and tax-related services. The firm caters to sectors including consumer goods and retail; energy  mining and infrastructure; financial institutions; healthcare; and technology  media and telecoms. It was founded in 1949 in Chicago and has 74 offices spanning Africa  Asia-Pacific  Europe  the Middle East  Latin America and North America.
Bakrie & Brothers is one of Indonesia’s foremost corporations. Its scope of business interests focuses on the manufacturing and infrastructure sectors.

Banco Safra operates as a financial banking institution. The bank offers leasing  securities underwriting  investments  brokerage  insurance  credit card operations  trade finance  and asset management services. Banco Safra serves customers in Brazil.

Bangchak is a leading Thailand-based petroleum company  with a refining capacity of 120 000 barrels per day. It operates more than 1 000 service stations nationwide under trademark. With a vision of excellence in green energy  the company also operates several renewable energy businesses  including the Sunny Bangchak and Bangchak Solar Energy (BSE) photovoltaic power generation plants  with a combined installed capacity of 170 MW  a 360 000 litre per day biodiesel plant  and a 400 000 litre per day ethanol plant.

Bangkok Bank is a leading bank in South-East Asia and a market leader in Thailand in corporate and business banking. It is listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand. With $97.3 billion in assets under management and $5 billion in total income in 2017  Bangkok Bank is the largest bank in Thailand. It has a branch network in 15 countries. Bangkok Bank was established in 1944 and listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand in 1975. It operates 1 100 branch networks nationwide and has 32 overseas locations in 15 economies  including branches in New York  London  Tokyo  China and Malaysia.

organization_site: Visit the Bank Lombard Odier & Co. website
organization_description: Founded in 1796  Lombard Odier is the oldest private bank in Geneva and one of the largest in Switzerland and in Europe. An independent family business for seven generations  it is run by six managing partners. Since they are both owners and managers  the success of their business is as important to them as it is to their clients. Its international presence  with over 25 offices worldwide  allows it to keep in close contact with the markets in the principal financial centres.

Bank Mandiri is one of Indonesias largest banks in terms of assets  loans and deposits. The bank currently employs more than 32 000 people and has 2 312 branches  as well as seven overseas branches  representative offices or subsidiaries. It had more than $1.5 billion in net profits in 2014 and a market capitalization of $19.6 billion. Global Finance named it the Best Bank in the World 2020.

organization_site: Visit the Bank of China website
organization_description: Bank of China  founded in 1912  is the longest continuously operating bank in China and the first A+H (Shanghai and Hong Kong) listed bank in China. It has played a significant role in developing Chinas foreign trade  promoting close cooperation with the international financial community and boosting Chinas economic growth and social progress. At the end of 2022  the Bank had 11 439 domestic and overseas institutions. Of these  10 908 are in Mainland China and 531 are in Hong Kong  Macau  Taiwan and other countries and regions in China. As of 2022  Bank of China had total assets of RMB 26 722.4 billion. In 2022  Bank of China has total operating income of RMB 618.0 billion  net profit of RMB 237.5 billion and customer deposits of RMB 20 201.8 billion. In 2022  Bank of China was ranked 42nd on the Fortune 500 list.

organization_site: Visit the Banque Saudi Fransi (BSF) website
