Airports  urban and interurban mobility services  highways and infrastructure that are increasingly innovative  sustainable  safe and efficient  responding to the new needs of society and seizing the growing opportunities at every level of the mobility system. Its Italian heart beats around the world: with over 25 000 employees  Mundys is present in 24 countries  with around 9 400 km of highways  5 airports  over 600 cities with intelligent transport system and other digital services that improve moving life.

organization_site: Visit the Naftogaz of Ukraine website
organization_description: Naftogaz of Ukraine is a leading enterprise in Ukraines fuel and energy complex. The companys production subsidiaries are involved in: oil and gas exploration; well drilling; oil and gas field development; oil and gas transportation through the main oil and gas pipeline systems; natural gas and gas condensate processing at gas processing plants; natural gas supply to consumers in Ukraine; sales of compressed and liquefied gas and oil products.

Nedbank Group is a bank holding company that operates as one of the four largest banking groups in South Africa. The companys shares have been listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange since 1969. The group offers a wide range of wholesale and retail banking services through four main business clusters  namely Nedbank Corporate and Investment Banking  Nedbank Retail and Business Banking and Nedbank Wealth. Nedbank Group focuses on southern Africa  with the group positioned to be a bank for all – both from a retail and wholesale banking perspective.

organization_site: Visit the Network for Teaching Entrepreneurship (NFTE) website
organization_description: Network for Teaching Entrepreneurship (NFTE) is a foundation with a mission to provide entrepreneurship education programmes to young people aged 11 to 18 and from low-income communities so that they can become economically productive members of society. It aims to create innovative and experiential curricula that improve academic  technological and life skills while imparting business knowledge. It trains teachers to deliver its programmes and partners with schools and community-based organizations to furnish the venues.

Founded in 2021  newcleo is creating a disruptive new approach to extracting energy from nuclei that is safe  clean  renewable and technologically accessible. newcleo is building the next generation of nuclear energy: eliminating the need for geological repositories by using a fast neutron flux  avoiding the production of long-life radioactive elements such as plutonium; developing an accelerator-driven system based on the coupling of a particle accelerator and a sub-critical reactor; accelerating the development of new fuel cycles that provide economic  clean  safe and inexhaustible energy from nuclei and the opportunity to burn the long-lived nuclear waste produced by old nuclear reactors.

Nord Security is home to advanced security solutions that share the Nord brand and values  including advanced VPN service NordVPN  next-generation password manager NordPass  encrypted cloud storage NordLocker  and advanced network access security solution NordLayer. Established in 2012  Nord Security has a global mission to shape a more trusted and peaceful online future for people everywhere by creating powerful and user-friendly cybersecurity products.

North Island was formed to build financial services technology companies operating at scale. North Island recently took a substantial stake in Virtu Financial  the high-frequency market maker  which in turn acquired the Knight Capital Group.
NTPC is among Indias largest integrated energy companies  with an installed capacity of 70 824 MW.
NV Investments is a California-based strategic investment advisory firm active in equities and venture capital  and specializing in the technology  media and telecommunications sectors.

OakNorth is the creator of the ON Credit Intelligence Suite  a cloud software that transforms commercial lending by providing lenders with a bottoms-up  granular  forward-looking view at both the borrower and portfolio level  based on expansive and dynamic data sets and sub-sector specific scenarios. Built by a team of 250 credit scientists and software engineers  it enables banks to lend smarter  faster and more to businesses. The software is being deployed by leading banks around the world  including Capital One  PNC  Fifth Third  SMBC  and OakNorth’s own bank in the United Kingdom (OakNorth Bank). OakNorth has raised $1 billion from investors.

Oando is a leading indigenous African energy company operating in the upstream  midstream and downstream sectors. It is listed on the Nigerian Stock Exchange and the Johannesburg Stock Exchange. In 2014  it concluded the acquisition of ConocoPhillipss Nigerian business through its upstream subsidiary  Oando Energy Resources  making it the countrys largest indigenous oil and gas producer. In July 2016  Oando entered into a tripartite agreement with the Vitol Group and Helios Investment Partner to form OVH.

OMINVEST is one of the oldest and largest investment firms in the Middle East and North Africa region. The firm has long owned high-quality assets producing healthy cash flows. Listed on the Muscat Securities Market  OMINVEST serves over 2 000 shareholders. OMINVEST operates on its six strategic platforms: banking  insurance  leasing  real estate  investment banking and financial investments (public and private equity investments in other growth sectors).

OMV produces and markets oil and gas  innovative energy and high-end petrochemical solutions. With group sales of €23 billion and a workforce of 20 000 employees in 2019  OMV is one of Austria’s largest listed industrial companies. In upstream  OMV has a base in Central and Eastern Europe and an international portfolio. Daily average production was 487 000 barrels of oil equivalent per day in 2019. In downstream  OMV operates three refineries in Europe and owns a 15% share in ADNOC Refining and Trading JV  with a total annual processing capacity of 24.9 million tonnes. OMV has a 36% participation in Borealis.

Orano processes nuclear materials  allowing them to contribute to the development of society in the energy and medical radiological research fields. The group offers high value-added products and services for the entire nuclear fuel cycle  from raw materials to waste processing. Its activities  ranging from mining to decommissioning and including conversion  enrichment  recycling  logistics and engineering  contribute to the production of low-carbon electricity. Orano and its 16 000 employees place their expertise  their continuous search for innovation  their mastery of advanced technologies and their absolute requirement for safety and security at the service of their customers in France and internationally.

Organon is primarily engaged in manufacturing  fabricating or processing drugs in pharmaceutical preparations for human or veterinary use. Its products consist of pharmaceutical preparations promoted primarily to the dental  medical or veterinary professions  and pharmaceutical preparations mostly for the public. Organon has a market value of $6.89 billion. Specifically  Organon focuses on women’s health  biosimilars and established medicines. Organon has more than 60 medicines and other products in areas including reproductive health  heart disease  dermatology  allergies and asthma. It has an international footprint that serves people in more than 140 markets.

organization_site: Visit the Palo Alto Networks website
organization_description: Palo Alto Networks is a next-generation security company leading a new era in cybersecurity by safely enabling applications and preventing cyber breaches for tens of thousands of organizations worldwide. Built with an innovative approach and highly differentiated cyberthreat prevention capabilities  its game-changing security platform delivers security superior to legacy or point products  safely enables daily business operations  and protects an organizations most valuable assets.

Pathfinder Group has about 15 000 employees in over 50 cities/towns in Pakistan. Pathfinder Group’s Security Services Division includes: Security & Management Services (SMS); Wackenhut Pakistan (WPPL). Its Financial Services and Technology Division includes: Virtual Remittance Gateway (VRG); i3 Pathfinder; and iPath.

Paytm is among Indias largest mobile payment and commerce platforms. With a current user base of more than 130 million  Paytm is on a mission to bring half a billion Indians into the mainstream economy using mobile payments  commerce and soon to be launched payment banking services. The consumer brand of Indias leading mobile internet company  One97 Communications  Paytm is headquartered in New Delhi NCR. The companys investors include Ant Financials (Alipay)  Alibaba Group  SAIF Partners  Sapphire Venture and Silicon Valley Bank.

Pega (NASDAQ: PEGA) is a leader in cloud software for customer engagement and operational excellence. It powers millions of automated processes  billions of customer interactions  and trillions of dollars of business by helping people open bank accounts  change phone plans  get healthcare  manage insurance claims  apply for permits  and more. Pega’s AI-powered software optimizes customer interactions on any channel. Its low-code application development platform allows enterprises to build and evolve apps to meet customer and employee needs and drive digital transformation. For more than 35 years  Pega has enabled higher customer satisfaction  lower costs and increased customer lifetime value.

organization_site: Visit the Permodalan Nasional Berhard (PNB) website
organization_description: Founded in 1978  Permodalan Nasional Berhad (PNB) is one of the largest fund management companies in Malaysia. The core function of PNB is to evaluate  select and acquire a sound portfolio of shares in limited companies with growth potential. As an organization that specializes in investment  PNB in essence acts as a warehouse  whereby shareholdings in these limited companies are placed in trust funds and sold to unit holders in the form of smaller units.

Based in Europe and with CHF700 billion in assets under management or custody  Pictet is a leading independent wealth and asset manager. The Pictet Group is owned and managed by eight managing partners. There have been only 45 managing partners since Pictet was founded in 1805. The principles on which Pictet has thrived over two centuries – independence  long-term thinking  partnership  responsibility and entrepreneurial spirit – have remained unchanged. Its purpose is to build responsible partnerships – with clients  colleagues  communities and the companies in which it invests. Headquartered in Geneva  Switzerland  Pictet employs 5 000 people in 30 offices in 19 countries worldwide.

Planet is a leading provider of global  daily satellite imagery and geospatial solutions. Planet is driven by a mission to image the world every day and make change visible  accessible and actionable. Founded in 2010  Planet designs  builds and operates one of the largest Earth observation fleets of imaging satellites  capturing 30 TB of data per day. Planet provides data  insights and software solutions to over 700 customers  comprising agriculture  forestry  intelligence  education and finance companies and government agencies  enabling users to derive value from satellite imagery. Planet is a public benefit corporation trading on the New York Stock Exchange as PL.

organization_site: Visit the Port of Antwerp-Bruges website
organization_description: Antwerp Bruges Port Authority is active in the development of the port areas of Antwerp and Zeebrugge  Belgium and responsible for the collection of harbour and tonnage dues  electronic data interchange services  towage and dredging services  vessel traffic management operations  the working of locks and bridges  and sea and waterway transport services.

Project 44 comprises tech and logistics experts solving supply chain problems. Founded in Chicago  one of the fastest-growing tech hubs  project44 has team members across the US and worldwide. It created the Advanced Visibility Platform for shippers and logistics service providers. It provides vital shipment information to over 900 enterprise customers  giving them more agility  automating manual processes and  as a result  empowering their supply chain resilience. It closed a Series E investment of $202 million  valuing the company at $1.2 billion. To date  it has raised $442.5 million.

PSA International is a global leader in the ports and terminals business  with investments in 29 port projects in 17 countries: Singapore  Thailand  Viet Nam  India  Pakistan  Saudi Arabia  China  South Korea  Japan  Belgium  the Netherlands  Italy  Portugal  Turkey  the United Kingdom  Argentina and Panama.

The Public Sector Pension Investment Board (PSP Investments) was established in September 1999. It manages employer and employee contributions to the federal Public Service  the Canadian Forces and the Royal Canadian Mounted Police pension funds and the employer and employee contributions to the Reserve Force Pension Fund. Annual net contributions are $4 billion. Assets are invested in fixed income instruments and Canadian and foreign equities  real estate  private equities  infrastructure and other investments through in-house and external managers. The Head Office of PSP Investments is located in Ottawa. Its principal business office is in Montreal.

PTT was established in 1978 to operate petroleum and other related businesses. In 2001  PTT registered on the Stock Exchange of Thailand. It is a state-owned enterprise under the supervision of the Ministry of Energy. PTT is a fully integrated national petroleum and petrochemical company covering the business value chain from upstream to downstream through an upstream petroleum and gas business group  a natural gas transmission pipeline system and gas separation plants  a downstream petroleum business group  and an infrastructure business group. PTT’s vision is “Powering Life with Future Energy and Beyond".

organization_site: Visit the Qatar National Bank website
organization_description: Since its establishment in 1964  Qatar National Bank Group has steadily grown to become one of the largest banks in Qatar and among the largest financial institutions in the Middle East and Africa (MEA) region.

QIAGEN is a leading global provider of sample and assay technologies used to transform biological materials into valuable molecular information. It has more than 500 000 customers involved in molecular diagnostics  applied testing  pharma and academia. It offers more than 500 products involving consumable kits and instruments. It is a Netherlands-based holding company with operational headquarters in the US and Germany. It employs 4 000 people in more than 35 locations worldwide.

Quexco is a US-based holding company for a number of investments in the energy and materials space. Its largest holding is Bestolife  a company producing compounds and lubricants for the oil and gas drilling industry.

Rakuten is a global leader in internet services that empower individuals  communities  businesses and society. Founded in Tokyo in 1997 as an online marketplace  Rakuten has expanded to offer services in e-commerce  fintech  digital content and communications to more than 1.2 billion members around the world. Since 2019  Rakuten is also Japan’s newest mobile network operator. The Rakuten Group has more than 17 000 employees and operations in 30 countries and regions.

Ralph Lauren is a global leader in the design  marketing and distribution of premium lifestyle products in five categories: apparel  footwear and accessories  home  fragrances and hospitality. For more than 50 years  Ralph Lauren has consistently developed its reputation and distinctive image for an expanding number of products  brands and international markets. The company’s brand names  which include Ralph Lauren  Ralph Lauren Collection  Ralph Lauren Purple Label  Polo Ralph Lauren  Double RL  Lauren Ralph Lauren  Polo Ralph Lauren Children  Chaps and Club Monaco  among others  constitute one of the world’s most widely recognized families of consumer brands.
Randon is an open capital holding that controls more than 10 companies operating in road transport equipment  auto parts  off-road special vehicles and service rendering.

Randstad is among the worlds largest human resources services providers. In 2021  Randstad helped more than 2 million people find a job  advised 235 000 clients on their human resources needs  from talent acquisition to total workforce management  and delivered training to over 450 000 people. Its consultants across almost 5 000 locations in 38 markets use data and technology to provide advice at scale. Randstad was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Diemen  the Netherlands. In 2021  it had 39 530 employees and generated revenue of €24.6 billion. It is listed on the NYSE Euronext.
Reech is an entrepreneurial group of businesses that is active internationally in real estate and real estate finance  wholesale and retail financial services and financial technology.

RenaissanceRe is one of the worlds largest and most successful re-insurers of natural and human-made catastrophes. It has also established a significant franchise as a specialty re-insurer for a wide range of coverage. It participates selectively in the insurance market through RenaissanceRe Syndicate 1458 at Lloyds. It also creates and manages joint ventures and structured products. Its largest joint ventures include DaVinci Reinsurance and Top Layer Reinsurance. The company is listed on the New York Stock Exchange: RNR.
ReNew Power is an independent power producer. It owns and operates close to 3.28 GW of commissioned and under-construction clean energy assets in solar and wind in 11 states in India.

Ringier is the largest internationally operating Swiss media company  producing over 120 newspapers and magazines. It also runs printing plants  radio and TV stations and well over 80 web and mobile platforms  with approximately 8 000 employees. Ringier stands for a pioneering spirit and individuality as well as independence  freedom of expression and diversity of information. The companys hallmarks are excellence in products  journalistic quality and exceptional entertainment. Founded in Switzerland in 1833  Ringier has been family-run for five generations.

Ripple is doing for value what the internet did for information: enabling its instant and seamless flow around the world. Ripple calls this the Internet of Value (IoV). Using blockchain and cryptocurrency technology  Ripple is dedicated to creating powerful gains in financial efficiency  equity and inclusion. In addition  Ripple is developing and enabling the future use cases that will catalyse the new digital economy for governments  businesses and consumers. Ripple has offices in San Francisco (HQ)  New York  London  Mumbai  Singapore  São Paulo  Reykjavík  Washington DC and Dubai.
F. Hoffmann-La Roche is a manufacturer of pharmaceuticals and diagnostic devices.

Roland Berger is a management consultancy of European heritage with a strong international footprint. As an independent firm  solely owned by its partners  it operates 50 offices in all major markets. Its 2 400 employees offer a combination of an analytical approach and an empathetic attitude. Driven by its values of entrepreneurship  excellence and empathy  Roland Berger is convinced that the world needs a new sustainable paradigm that takes the entire value cycle into account. Working in diverse teams spanning relevant industries and business functions  the firm provides the expertise that meets the challenges of today and tomorrow.

The historic city of AlUla occupies an area of around 22 000 square kilometres. The Royal Commission for AlUla has laid out a strategic roadmap for the development of the entire area based on sound social  economic and ecological principles. The objective is to create over 38 000 jobs allowing the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia to diversify beyond oil and contribute over $32 billion to the national GDP by 2035. The core pillars of the AlUla strategy are: (1) tourism  heritage and nature; (2) local community; (3) economic diversification. The enabling pillars are physical development  enabling services and institutional excellence.

Vopak is a leading independent tank storage company. It takes pride in storing vital products with care  for a growing world population  including energy  chemicals and edible oils. It is developing new infrastructure solutions to actively contribute to the introduction of future vital products  focusing on zero- and low-carbon hydrogen  ammonia  CO2 capture  flow batteries and sustainable feedstocks. Vopak has a track record of over 400 years in navigating change and is continuously investing in innovation. Vopak is listed on the Euronext Amsterdam and is headquartered in Rotterdam  the Netherlands.

Ruder Finn is one of the worlds largest independent global communications and creative agencies. Founded in 1948  Ruder Finn has defined and redefined PR for more than 70 years  shaping communications that help move industry-defining brands  companies and leaders from whats now to whats next. Headquartered in New York  it provides clients with bold communications strategies based on a global perspective and localized market knowledge that redefine leadership  reimagine the marketplace  and rethink customer experiences around a shared sense of purpose. The agency has four core areas of expertise: health and wellness  corporate reputation  technology and innovation and consumer connection.

organization_site: Visit the Russell Reynolds Associates website
organization_description: Russell Reynolds Associates is a global leadership advisory and search firm. Its 470 consultants in 46 offices work with public  private and non-profit organizations worldwide. It helps clients build teams of transformational leaders who can meet challenges and anticipate the sustainability  digital  economic and political trends that are reshaping the global business environment. From helping boards with their structure  culture and effectiveness to identifying  assessing and defining the best leadership for organizations  its teams bring decades of expertise to help clients address their most complex leadership issues. It exists to improve the way the world is led.

RWE is leading the way to a green energy world. With an extensive investment and growth strategy  the company will expand its powerful  green generation capacity to 50 gigawatts internationally by 2030. RWE is investing €50 billion gross for this purpose in this decade. The portfolio is based on offshore and onshore wind  solar  hydrogen  batteries  biomass and gas. RWE Supply & Trading provides tailored energy solutions for large customers. RWE has locations in markets in Europe  North America and the Asia-Pacific region. The company is responsibly phasing out nuclear energy and coal.

S4Capital is a digital advertising and marketing services company. S4Capitals strategy is to build a purely digital advertising and marketing services business by integrating leading businesses in three areas: first-party data  digital content  digital media planning and buying.

Samuel Group of Companies is a Canadian family business  founded in 1855  consisting of operations across North America engaged in the processing  manufacturing and distribution of steel and other metals.

Founded in 1890  San Miguel is one of the largest and most diversified conglomerates in the Philippines by market capitalization and total assets  with sales equalling approximately 6.5% of GDP. San Miguel has market-leading businesses and investments in food  beverage  packaging  fuel and oil  energy  infrastructure  telecommunications  mining and aviation. Its 2013 revenue reached P748 billion  while net profit was P38.1 billion. With over 100 facilities in the Philippines  China  South-East Asia and Australia  San Miguel employs over 18 000 employees.

SandboxAQ is an enterprise software-as-a-service company combining artificial intelligence (AI) and quantum tech to solve hard problems impacting society. Its solutions include post-Rivest-Shamir-Adleman (RSA) cybersecurity modules that migrate enterprises to higher levels of security. These Sandbox AQ modules enable post-quantum cryptography (PQC) in line with the new standards that are now emerging in this field.

The Saudi Industrial Development Fund (SIDF) contributes to the realization of the goals  policies and programmes of Saudi Arabia’s industrial development by providing the finance and advisory services needed to support the growth and development of the local industrialization and upgrading the level of industry performance. SIDFs mission is to support and diversify the Saudi economy by helping to shape industrial sectors  developing competitive enterprises  and supporting strategic initiatives. SIDF provides loans and advisory services to investors wishing to expand or modernize industrial projects and supports small and medium-sized enterprises by providing them with special financing products.

Saudi National Bank is set to become the Kingdom’s largest wholesale bank and national champion  with $223 billion in assets. Saudi National Bank is the product of a merger between the National Commercial Bank of Saudi Arabia and Samba Financial Group  which was finalized in Q2 of 2021.

Sealed Air is a global leader in food safety and security  facility hygiene and product protection. With brands such as Bubble Wrap cushioning  Cryovac food packaging solutions and Diversey cleaning and hygiene solutions  it offers efficient and sustainable solutions that create business value  enhance quality of life and provide a cleaner and healthier environment. On a pro forma basis  it generated revenue of $7.6 billion in 2010 and has approximately 26 000 employees serving customers in 175 countries.

The Sekunjalo Group has investment holdings in the African oil and energy sector  resources  financial services  healthcare and pharmaceuticals  biotechnology  fishing and aquaculture  food and beverages  information and communication technologies (ICT)  hospital information systems  leisure  entertainment and media. It is an investor in multinationals and a South African partner to international businesses in other sectors. It has 200 investments  predominantly in sub-Saharan Africa  and is the owner of the largest print and online media group in South Africa  with 24 titles and the second largest online site.

SG Holdings is a provider of international door-to-door delivery services and other services related to delivery and logistics. Its services  which are currently expanding in Asia  include international distribution  logistics  warehouse operations and domestic transport.

organization_site: Visit the Siam Cement Group (SCG) website
organization_description: Siam Cement Group is active in cement.

organization_site: Visit the Siemens Gamesa Renewable Energy website
organization_description: Siemens Gamesa is a Spanish-based engineering company. It manufactures wind turbines and provides onshore and offshore wind services. It is the worlds second largest wind turbine manufacturer. It is also a global technological leader in the wind industry  including the design  manufacturing  installation and maintenance of wind turbines. Gamesa has production centres throughout Europe  the US  China  India and Brazil. Gamesa is also a world leader in the development  construction and sale of wind farms  having installed over 6 400 MW and a portfolio of 24 000 MW in Europe  America and Asia.

The purpose of Siemens Healthineers is to drive innovation to help humans live healthier and longer. Its mission is to enable healthcare providers to increase value by expanding precision medicine  transforming care delivery  improving the patient experience  and digitalizing healthcare. Its portfolio  from in-vitro diagnostics and imaging to therapy and follow-up care  addresses the complete care continuum for many threatening diseases. Technologies provided by Siemens Healthineers touch 240 000 patients every hour. Its solutions influence almost three-quarters of all critical clinical decisions. It is a leading medical technology company with over 120 years of experience and more than 66 000 employees.

Sino Group consists of Sino Land Group and Ng Family Private Group. It is a major property development and investment company dedicated to the development of Hong Kong. Over 50 projects are under development and the existing portfolio contains quality rental properties.

SIX Group operates Switzerlands financial market infrastructure and offers on a global scale comprehensive services in the areas of securities trading  clearing and settlement  as well as financial information and payment transactions. The company is owned by its users: approximately 140 banks of various sizes and orientations.

Schlumberger is a leading provider of technology for reservoir characterization  drilling  production and processing to the oil and gas industry. Working in more than 85 countries and employing approximately 100 000 people who represent over 140 nationalities  Schlumberger supplies a comprehensive range of products and services  from exploration through production and integrated pore-to-pipeline solutions for hydrocarbon recovery that optimize reservoir performance. It has principal offices in Paris  Houston  London and The Hague  and reported revenues from continuing operations of $30 billion in 2017.

SolarEdge is a NASDAQ-listed global leader in smart energy technology. Headquartered in Israel  SolarEdge invented a solution that improved the way power is generated and managed in photovoltaic (PV) systems. It gained a strong reputation for maximizing power generation while lowering the cost of energy – through large-scale PV inverter manufacturing  energy storage  EV charging  grid services  batteries and uninterrupted supply solutions.

Solugen is a venture-backed specialty chemicals company that applies industrial biotechnology and green chemistry principles to redesign the production of a variety of end-use and novel chemicals. The company’s first product  BioPeroxide  was created using patented enzymatic technology to convert plant sugars into hydrogen peroxide and was followed by the manufacturing of a comprehensive line of products such as their flagship ScaleSol and BioChelate solutions.

Sonae is a multinational company managing a diversified portfolio of businesses in retail  financial services  technology  shopping centres and telecommunications. Present in over 80 countries and with about 40 000 employees  Sonae is a trusted organization worldwide and a contributor to a more prosperous  ethical and sustainable society. It has strong values  a responsible method and a distinctive culture. To create economic and social value in the long run  taking the benefits of progress and innovation to an ever-increasing number of people is the mission statement that it pledges before stakeholders.

organization_site: Visit the State Bank of India website
organization_description: State Bank of India is the largest commercial bank in India in terms of assets  deposits  profits  branches and employees. At the end of 2015-16  the bank had total assets of INR22.59 trillion  total deposits of INR22.538 trillion and net profit of INR99.5 billion. The bank has a domestic network of 16 784 branches and over 59 000 ATMs  and 198 offices in 37 countries. The State Bank Group has a market share of 21.5% in deposits and 22.1% in advances.

organization_site: Visit the State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance website
organization_description: State Farm is an insurer of more vehicles than any other insurer in North America. Its 17 800 agents and more than 65 000 employees deal with more than 79 million auto  fire  life and health policies in the US and Canada. It also offers financial services products and is ranked number 37 on the Fortune 500 list.

organization_site: Visit the Stellar Development Foundation website
organization_description: The Stellar Development Foundation (SDF) is a non-profit organization founded in 2014 to support the development and growth of the open-source Stellar blockchain network. SDF and Stellar seek to unlock the world’s economic potential by making money more fluid  markets more open  and people more empowered. The foundation helps maintain Stellar’s codebase  supports the technical and business communities around Stellar  and is a speaking partner to regulators and institutions. SDF is a non-stock  non-profit corporation organized under the laws of Delaware.
Stena has international activities in shipping  ferry lines  drilling rigs  real estate  recycling and finance.

Listed on the New York Stock Exchange  Stifel is a diversified global wealth management and investment banking company headquartered in St. Louis  Missouri  US. Stifel provides financial services to clients including individuals  public and private businesses  municipalities  and institutional and professional money managers. Its Global Wealth Management business has $408 billion in client assets under management  offering private investors holistic wealth management capabilities  from wealth planning and investment management  to trust planning and banking capabilities. Its Institutional Group business is a full-service investment bank in a leading position among middle-market companies. Stifel has 9 000 employees and generates annual revenues of $4.4 billion.

For more than 160 years  SUEZ has been delivering essential services that protect and improve the quality of life. SUEZ enables its customers to provide access to water and waste services  with resilient and innovative solutions. With its 35 000 employees present in 40 countries  the group drives the ecological transition of its customers. In 2021  SUEZ produced drinking water for 66 million people and sanitation services for 33 million people worldwide. It generates 3.6 TWh of energy from waste and wastewater yearly and has avoided the emission of 3.8 million tonnes of CO2. The group generated revenues of €7.5 billion in 2021.

organization_site: Visit the Sun Pharmaceutical Industries website
organization_description: Sun Pharma is among the worlds largest generic pharmaceutical companies and a leader in India. It provides high-quality  affordable medicines to customers and patients in over 100 countries. Sun Pharmas global presence is supported by more than 40 manufacturing facilities spread throughout 5 continents  R&D centres around the world and a multi-cultural workforce comprising over 50 nationalities. Sun Pharma fosters excellence through innovation supported by strong R&D capabilities comprising around 2 000 scientists and R&D investments of 7-8% of annual revenues.

organization_site: Visit the Swiss Bank of Geneva (BCGE) website
organization_description: Swiss Bank of Geneva (BCGE) is a universal bank founded in 1816 that provides banking services for private  business and institutional customers mainly in Geneva and in Switzerland. It offers everyday banking facilities  private banking and asset management  pension planning  mortgages and lending to the private and public sectors. It runs a trading room and offers financial engineering  corporate finance and global commodity finance services. The group operates in Geneva  Lausanne  Zurich  Lyon  Annecy  Paris  Hong Kong and Dubai. It employs 810 people.

organization_site: Visit the Swiss International Air Lines website
organization_description: Swiss International Air Lines (SWISS) serves over 100 destinations in 43 countries from Zurich and Geneva and carries more than 16.5 million passengers a year with its 91-aircraft fleet. As the airline of Switzerland  SWISS embodies the country’s traditional values and is committed to delivering the highest product and service quality. With its workforce of over 9 000 personnel  SWISS generated total operating income of roughly CHF5 billion in 2016. SWISS is part of the Lufthansa Group and is also a member of Star Alliance  the world’s biggest airline grouping.

Syngenta is one of the worlds leading companies  with more than 28 000 employees in over 90 countries dedicated to the purpose of bringing plant potential to life. Through world-class science  global reach and commitment to its customers  it helps to increase crop productivity  protect the environment  and improve health and quality of life.

Teleperformance is a global leader in outsourced digital integrated business services. Teleperformance provides omnichannel customer experience services  including trust and safety services  for some of the world’s most popular and trusted brands. It has 410 000 employees and is operating in over 170 markets. Within Trust & Safety (T&S)  services are offered in over 54 languages and 30 countries.

Headquartered in Shenzhen  China  and founded in 1998  Tencent is an internet-based technology and cultural enterprise. Its mission is to “improve the quality of life through internet value-added services”. Tencent delivers integrated internet solutions to over 1 billion netizens. An industry leader and global pioneer in innovative  digital-based technology solutions  it aims to provide platforms and services that connect everything. Through the company’s two principal business operations  social platforms and digital content  Tencent develops and delivers game-changing products  such as social communication platforms Weixin/WeChat and QQ  that connect people with services  foster closer relationships and create new business opportunities.

organization_site: Visit the The Estée Lauder Companies website
organization_description: Estée Lauder is one of the worlds leading manufacturers and marketers of quality skin care  makeup  fragrance and hair care products. As a global leader in prestige beauty  it touches over half a billion consumers a year. Its products are sold in over 150 countries and territories under the AERIN  Aramis  Aveda  BECCA  Bobbi Brown  Bumble and bumble  By Kilian  Clinique  Darphin  Donna Karan  DKNY  Dr. Jart+  Editions de Parfums Frédéric Malle  Ermenegildo Zegna  Estée Lauder  Lab Series  Le Labo  M•A•C  Michael Kors  Prescriptives  RODIN olio lusso  Smashbox  Tom Ford  Tommy Hilfiger and other brand names.

organization_site: Visit the Thermo Fisher Scientific website
organization_description: Thermo Fisher Scientific enables its customers to make the world healthier  cleaner and safer by providing analytical instruments  equipment  reagents and consumables  software and services for research  analysis  discovery and diagnostics. With annual sales of $17 billion  the firm has over 50 000 employees and serves more than 350 000 customers in pharmaceutical and biotech companies  hospitals and clinical diagnostic labs  universities  research institutions and government agencies  as well as environmental  industrial quality and process control settings.

organization_site: Visit the Tillman Global Holdings website
organization_description: Founded in 2013 by Sanjiv Ahuja  Tillman Global Holdings (TGH) is a US-based holding company that invests in  and creates  telecom and energy infrastructure businesses focused on developed and emerging markets. TGH and its associated companies have global telecom infrastructure ownership footprints and operational and management experience. The TGH leadership team has built and managed a portfolio of telecom infrastructure assets in Asia  Africa  Europe and the US.

Since its founding in 1923  TIME Magazine has been one of the most authoritative and informative guides to what is happening in politics  business  health  science and entertainment. Time has one of the worlds largest circulations for a weekly news magazine. The print edition has a readership of 26 million  20 million of whom are based in the United States. Formerly published by Time Inc.  since November 2018 Time has been published by TIME USA  owned by Marc Benioff.
Titan Cement is a multinational building material company active in Greece  the US  South-East Europe and the Middle East.

TNO  the Netherlands Organisation for Applied Scientific Research  was founded by law in 1932 to enable business and government to apply knowledge. As an organization regulated by public law  it is independent  not part of any government  university or company.

Tokio Marine Group is among the longest running insurance undertakings in Japan. It consists of Tokio Marine Holdings  249 subsidiaries and 32 affiliates located worldwide extending to 38 countries and regions through offices in 469 cities. The group operates in a broad array of non-life insurance  life insurance and financial and general businesses.

organization_name: Tony Blair Institute for Global Change
organization_site: Visit the Tony Blair Institute for Global Change website
organization_description: The Tony Blair Institute for Global Change is a not-for-profit that equips governments to respond to today’s challenges and seize tomorrow’s opportunities. It works with political leaders and governments worldwide on strategy  policy and delivery – with technology as an enabler of all three. With 600 staff and growing  the Tony Blair Institute for Global Change operates in more than 30 countries.

Tosyali Holding manufactures steel products. The company products and markets steel welded pipes  billets  hot-rolled coils  tubes and metal bars. It also produces a wide range of pipes for water  natural gas  scaffolding and industrial use. Tosyali distributes its products worldwide.
Toyota is active in the manufacture and sale of automobiles  industrial vehicles  parts and components  and home-related equipment.

organization_name: Trade and Development Bank of Mongolia
organization_site: Visit the Trade and Development Bank of Mongolia website
organization_description: Trade and Development Bank of Mongolia was established in October 1990 and has become a leading banking and financial services provider in Mongolia. The oldest bank in Mongolia prides itself on its leading position as a universal banking service provider  offering a full range of services  including large corporate  small and medium-sized enterprise (SME) and retail lending  deposit-taking  trade finance  remittance  cash management  treasury  foreign exchange and investment banking. It acts as a primary lender across all major industrial and commercial sectors.

Tradeshift drives supply chain innovation for the digitally connected economy. As a leader in supply chain payments and marketplaces  the company helps buyers and suppliers digitize all their trade transactions  collaborate on every process  and connect with any supply chain app. More than 1.5 million companies in 190 countries trust Tradeshift to process over $500 billion in transaction value  making it the largest global business network for buying and selling.

Trane Technologies is a global climate innovator that brings efficient and sustainable climate solutions to buildings  homes and transportation through its strategic brands Trane and Thermo King  and its portfolio of environmental products and services. The company develops solutions for sustainability challenges while bringing heating  cooling and refrigerated food  medicine  vaccines and perishables to people worldwide. Its 2030 Sustainability Commitments include a pledge to reduce customers’ carbon emissions by one gigaton (2% of annual emissions worldwide) and to achieve carbon-neutral operations. These commitments extend to communities through investments in education and workforce development  housing and comfort  and food and wellness.

Tree Energy Solutions (TES) aims to accelerate the energy transition by leveraging existing global energy infrastructure to reach customers with green hydrogen  green gas and green power while accelerating the phasing-out of fossil fuels from the system globally and introducing a circular carbon economy. TES provides green hydrogen at scale into global markets and in particular to the mobility  industrial and power sectors. TES is developing energy supply and import hubs in Germany  Belgium  the Netherlands  France  Canada and the US to integrate and optimize global supply chains. It is developing initial production and export hubs in the Middle East and North America.

Trellix is a global company redefining the future of cybersecurity. The company’s open and native extended detection and response (XDR) platform helps organizations confronted by today’s most advanced threats gain confidence in the protection and resilience of their operations. Trellix’s security experts  along with an extensive partner system  accelerate technology innovation through machine learning and automation to empower over 40 000 business and government customers. Trellix was founded in 2022 through a merger of McAfee and FireEye.

organization_site: Visit the Tsingtao Brewery Co. Ltd website
organization_description: Chinas largest producer of beer  founded in 1903  owns over 20 brewing facilities and one malting mill. Its award-winning Tsingtao Beer is exported to over 50 countries and is one of the most well-known Chinese brands in the international market. It is an official Sponsor of the Beijing 2008 Olympic Games.

Turkiye Wealth Fund (TWF) is the sovereign wealth fund of Turkey  established by law in 2016. TWF’s mission is to develop Turkey’s strategic assets  to grow their value and thereby to provide funding for the country’s priority investments. The fund manages approximately $33 billion in assets.

The TVS Group is a leading supplier of automotive components based in India. With a combined turnover of $6.5 billion  the group employs 39 000 people. Charting a steady growth path of expansion and diversification  it currently comprises around over 50 companies. These operate in fields that range from two-wheeler and automotive component manufacturing to automotive dealerships  finance and electronics. Uniting these multiple businesses is a common ethos of quality  customer service and social responsibility.

Underwriters Laboratories (UL) Research Institutes is a leading independent safety science organization with global reach. It senses and acts on risks to public safety with hypotheses and investigations. It is comprised of five research institutes: Chemical Insights  Digital Safety  Electrochemical Safety  Fire Safety  Materials Discovery.

Unico IDtech is a Brazilian identification technology company that offers facial biometrics and digital admission solutions. It is among the first Brazilian IDTech companies to offer solutions in facial biometrics and digital admission. Unico was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in São Paulo. Unico has large Brazilian banks and retail companies as clients.

Unipol Gruppo is a leading insurance group in Europe  with a total income of €16.5 billion  of which €7.9 billion in non-life business and €8.6 billion in life business (2015). Unipol covers a complete range of insurance and financial products  operating primarily through its subsidiary UnipolSai Assicurazioni. The group is also active in direct vehicle insurance  health protection and supplementary pensions  has a strong presence in the banking assurance channel  and operates in the banking  real estate  hotel and agricultural sectors.

Unitel is the largest mobile operator in Angola. Founded in 1998 and operating since 2001  it is a pioneer in the mobile telecommunications market in the country  with more than 11 million customers. Since 2001  UNITEL has been expanding the range of its services  currently offering a fifth-generation connection  in 3G  GPRS  EDGE  UMTS GSM  LTE and NR  progressively increasing the coverage radius nationally. UNITEL has more than 14 000 km of optical fibre providing a network capable of supporting the transmission of voice and data calls.

organization_site: Visit the Vital Capital Fund website
organization_description: Vital Capital Fund is a $350 million impact-investing private equity fund. It invests in opportunities that simultaneously enhance the quality of life of communities in rapidly developing nations  primarily in sub-Saharan Africa  while also delivering attractive financial returns for investors. Using its "No Trade-Off" approach to tangible and measurable impact and financial returns  Vital invests throughout sub-Saharan Africa  with a primary emphasis on vibrant urban community development  commercial agriculture  healthcare  clean energy  and water and education.

Voyager Space is a privately held global holding company acquiring and operating companies in the space exploration industry. Voyager seeks to increase vertical integration and mission capability to enable humanity’s most ambitious projects.

VSP Vision’s purpose is to empower human potential through sight. For more than 65 years  VSP has been a leader in health-focused vision care as a not-for-profit vision benefits company in the US. Its complementary businesses (VSP Vision Care  Marchon Eyewear  Visionworks  Eyefinity  Eyeconic  VSP Optics  and VSP Ventures) provide affordable access to eye care and eyewear for 85 million members through a network of 41 000 doctors. It is also expanding access to vision care to those disadvantaged by income  distance or disaster. Through VSP Eyes of Hope  more than 3.6 million people in need have received no-cost eye care and eyewear.

organization_site: Visit the Web 3.0 Technologies Foundation website
organization_description: Web 3.0 Foundations mission is to nurture cutting-edge applications for decentralized web software protocols. It aims to deliver a decentralized and fair internet where users control their own data  identity and destiny. The foundation supports Web 3.0 teams and open-source projects through funding  advocacy  research and collaborations. Polkadot  Web3 Foundations flagship protocol  is a scalable sharded chain and the first protocol that provides a secure environment for cross-chain composability.

organization_site: Visit the World Fuel Services website
organization_description: Headquartered in Miami  Florida  World Fuel Services is a global energy management company involved in providing energy procurement advisory services  supply fulfilment and transaction and payment management solutions to commercial and industrial customers  principally in the aviation  marine and land transportation industries. World Fuel Services sells fuel and delivers services to its clients at more than 8 000 locations in more than 200 countries and territories worldwide.

Worley is a global company headquartered in Australia driven by a common purpose to deliver a more sustainable world. Worley’s ideas have switched on the lights in a million Kenyan homes. It has provided fresh drinking water to local communities and transformed waste products into clean energy. As a leading global provider of professional project and asset services in the energy  chemicals and resources sectors  Worley has 51 000 staff spanning operations in 46 countries. As a knowledge-based service provider  the company uses its knowledge and capabilities to support customers as they reduce their emissions and move to a low-carbon future.

Xiaomi was founded in April 2010 and is now listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange (1810.HK). It is among the world’s largest smartphone brands and has established a leading consumer internet of things platform. Xiaomi products are present in more than 90 countries and regions. Xiaomi is committed to continuous customer-centric innovation  with a focus on quality and innovation with honest prices to let everyone in the world benefit from technology. In July 2019  the company ranked 468th on the Fortune Global 500  7th among internet companies. Xiaomi is the youngest company on the 2019 Fortune Global 500 list.

ZF is a global leader in driveline and chassis technology as well as active and passive safety technology. The company has a global workforce of 146 000  with approximately 230 locations in some 40 countries. In 2017  ZF achieved sales of €36.4 billion. It is one of the largest automotive suppliers worldwide. ZF enables vehicles to see  think and act. The company invests more than 6% of its sales in research and development annually. The Zeppelin Foundation  administered by the City of Friedrichshafen  holds 93.8% of the company’s shares and the Dr. Jürgen and Irmgard Ulderup Foundation Lemförde holds 6.2%.

ZS is a management consulting and technology firm focused on transforming global healthcare and beyond. It leverages its leading-edge analytics  plus the power of data  science and technology  to help clients make more intelligent decisions  deliver innovative solutions and improve outcomes for all. Founded in 1983  ZS has more than 12 000 employees in 35 offices worldwide.

Aegea is among the largest private sanitation companies in Brazil. It plays a fundamental role in supplying vital resources for the quality of life of millions of Brazilians. Its operations are guided by respect for society  the environment and ethical principles. It is a transforming agent in the lives of people and the cities where it operates.

organization_site: Visit the African Risk Capacity (ARC) website
organization_description: African Risk Capacity (ARC) is a specialist insurance company established by the African Union to help African governments improve their capacity to better plan for  prepare for and respond to extreme weather events and natural disasters and adapt to climate change. ARC works through collaboration and innovative finance to enable countries to strengthen disaster risk management systems and access rapid and predictable financing when disaster strikes to protect the food security and livelihoods of vulnerable populations. Since inception  ARC has provided coverage worth $660 million to insure 72 million vulnerable people in member states and paid out $65 million in claims.

Allied Irish Banks (AIB Group) is among Irelands largest banking and financial services groups. It operates through three divisions: AIB Bank for retail and commercial banking activities in Ireland and the United Kingdom  AIB Capital Markets for corporate  treasury  international and investment banking activities  and the Polish division  which comprises a 70.5% shareholding in Wielkopolski Bank Kredytowy  with headquarters in Wroclaw in western Poland.

Airbus Group has achieved parity with its largest competitor in the commercial aircraft segment  is a leading helicopter company worldwide  is a European leader in space business  and is second in Europe in the defence sector. Since the groups founding in 2000  it has increased its revenues by 145% and its annual order intake by 346%. Airbus Group innovates every day to increase its competitive advantage by enhancing product performance  creating new customer benefits and reducing costs.

organization_site: Visit the Andhra Pradesh Economic Development Board (APEDB) website
organization_description: The Andhra Pradesh Economic Development Board (APEDB) has been conceived to accelerate the inclusive economic growth of Andhra Pradesh. The board acts as a catalyst to facilitate economic growth  investment climate  reforms and competitiveness in Andhra Pradesh. Its functions include: strategic investment planning and promotion; nodal point of contact for investments; mobilization of resources required for supplementing public and private investment; facilitating inter-departmental coordination; economic and policy research.
Archer is an Australian ASX listed company developing innovative deep tech for commercialisation in the multibillion-dollar global industries of quantum technology  human health  and reliable energy.

ASIMCO manufactures a wide range of products  including NVH and rubber seals  piston rings  valve seat rings and material process technology related products  such as engine cylinder heads and blocks  camshafts  and powder metal sintered parts.

organization_site: Visit the Banco Nacional de Panamá (Banconal) website
organization_description: Banco Nacional de Panamá (Banconal) is a financial entity at the service of the Panamanian state and of all the productive sectors of the country. Its purpose is to promote the development of the national economy. Banco Nacional de Panama was founded in June 1904. In 1911  it changed its name to Banco Nacional and in 1956 was declared as state bank with. Its main functions are to act as state fiscal agent and depository of the nations funds  regulate the flow of interbank documents and provide commercial  private and consumer banking services.

organization_site: Visit the Bank Gospodarstwa Krajowego (BGK) website
organization_description: BGK (Bank Gospodarstwa Krajowego) is a state development bank – the only institution of this type in Poland. Its mission is to support the sustainable social and economic growth of the country. BGK initiates and facilitates cooperation between businesses  the public sector  and financial institutions. It finances infrastructural investment projects  provide Poles with greater access to the housing market and supports the activity of Polish companies  both domestically and internationally. Its activity is based on doing business in a responsible  ethical and sustainable manner. Therefore  BGK undertakes a wide range of initiatives aimed at promoting entrepreneurship  innovation  protection of the environment  as well as fair treatment of employees  partners and customers.

organization_site: Visit the Bank of Industry website
organization_description: Bank of Industry is a leading development financial institution (DFI) in Nigeria. In 2020  the Federal Ministry of Finance held 94.8% of its issued share capital and the Central Bank of Nigeria held 5.2%. Its mandate is to provide long-term financing to Nigeria’s emerging industrial sector by supporting large enterprises and micro-  small  and medium-sized enterprises. The bank’s operations include agro and food processing  creative industries  engineering and technology  healthcare and petrochemicals  oil and gas  renewable energy  and solid minerals. The bank also manages dedicated funds and  through its subsidiaries  provides business advisory services  trusteeship  leasing  insurance and brokerage services.

Beximco Group  a private sector group in Bangladesh  encompasses one of South Asias largest vertically integrated textile and garment companies. Beximco Pharmaceuticals is present in 55 countries. Under the provisions of a World Trade Organization agreement  Beximco was the first company globally to formulate and sell a generic version of the COVID-19 therapeutic Remdesivir  a critical step in helping alleviate the medical effects of the virus on the populations of poor countries. It has joined with the Government of Bangladesh and the Serum Institute of India to deliver 30 million doses of COVID-19 vaccine developed by AstraZeneca.

organization_site: Visit the Biotechnology Innovation Organization website
organization_description: Biotechnology Innovation Organization (BIO) is among the worlds largest trade associations representing biotechnology companies  academic institutions  state biotechnology centres and related organizations in the United States and in more than 30 other nations. BIO is an organization engaged in promoting the business interests of members.

organization_site: Visit the BRANDi and Companies website
organization_description: Since 2012  BRANDi and Companies  a brand-centric management consultancy  has helped clients with their critical transformation goal: “converting a traditional business to sustainable one”. BRANDi has proven its approaches in 18 industries  ensuring that the gap between strategy  operation and communication is seamlessly bridged and that all business activities create value for all stakeholders. With its belief in the triple bottom line (3Ps) alongside a wide range of capabilities  know-how and globally accredited models and theories  BRANDi works with clients  ranging from multinational companies to state enterprises  to catalyse economic growth while creating positive impact in the system.

Colgate-Palmolive is a multinational consumer products company headquartered on Park Avenue in Midtown Manhattan  New York City. It specializes in the production  distribution and provision of household  healthcare  personal care and veterinary products. It serves people in over 200 countries and territories. Its three fundamental values are caring  global teamwork and continuous improvement  which are part of everything it does.

organization_site: Visit the Commercial International Bank (CIB) website
organization_description: Commercial International Bank (CIB) is a leading financial services corporation in Egypt incorporated in 1975 as a joint venture. Its services include corporate banking  retail banking and other business lines. It is one of Egypts largest private sector banks and one of the countrys most profitable financial services institutions.

The Consello Group is a financial services advisory and strategic investing platform. At Consello  we advise clients for leadership  we invest capital to grow companies  and we execute for our banking clients across industries through one integrated platform. We also offer business development services to help companies grow and a digital currency advisory business to help companies evolve. Consello offers these four distinct but integrated lines of businesses all on one platform: Merchant Banking and M&A Advisory  Business Development  Investing and Digital Currency Advisory.

CyberArk is a security company focused on striking targeted cyber threats. It helps companies protect their highest-value information assets  infrastructure  and applications. The company is focused on delivering a new category of targeted security solutions that help clients stop reacting to cyber threats and get ahead of them  preventing attack escalation before irreparable business harm is done.

Dairy Management and its related organizations work to increase sales and demand for dairy through research  education and innovation  and to maintain confidence in dairy foods  farms and businesses. DMI manages the National Dairy Council and the American Dairy Association  and founded the U.S. Dairy Export Council and the Innovation Center for U.S. Dairy. DMI  which is funded by dairy importers and America’s 37 000 dairy farmers  is a strategic consultant and resource to businesses and organizations in the food and beverage sector that seek to increase sales and raise their image through the innovative use of dairy and dairy ingredients.

DNV is an independent assurance and risk management provider operating in more than 100 countries. Its purpose is to safeguard life  property and the environment. Whether assessing a new ship design  qualifying technology for a floating wind farm  analysing sensor data from a gas pipeline or certifying a food companys supply chain  DNV enables its customers and their stakeholders to manage technological and regulatory complexity with confidence.  As a trusted voice for many of the world’s most successful organizations  DNV uses its experience and expertise to advance safety and sustainable performance  set industry standards  and inspire and invent solutions.

Eastnets is a global provider of compliance and payment solutions for the financial services sector. Its experience and expertise help ensure trust at 800 financial institutions worldwide. For more than 35 years  it has worked to keep the world safe and secure from financial crime by helping partners manage risk through screening  monitoring  analysis and reporting  consultancy and customer support. As specialists in end-to-end payment systems  Eastnets turns payment challenges into opportunities  helping financial institutions operate more efficiently and cost-effectively. That includes the 270 corporate and financial institutions that rely on it for outsourced SWIFT connectivity and compliance software solutions.

organization_site: Visit the Eden Global Partners website
organization_description: Eden Global Partners is a growth equity firm.

The Jones Financial Companies (Edward Jones) is a financial services firm headquartered in St. Louis  Missouri. It serves investment clients in the US and Canada  through its branch network of more than 15 000 locations and 19 000 financial advisers. The company has relationships with nearly 8 million clients and $1.7 trillion in assets  under management worldwide. The firm focuses solely on individual investors and small-business owners. Edward Jones is a limited liability partnership owned only by its employees and retired employees and is not publicly traded. Managing Partner Penny Pennington is the only woman to lead a major US brokerage firm.

eToro is one of the world’s leading social investment networks. It aims to revolutionize the way people invest and enhance investors’ financial education. With innovative investment tools and a collaborative trading community  eToro empowers millions of users in over 140 countries to trade and invest in a simple and transparent way.
Fluxys is involved in natural gas distribution and international gas supplies. Its strategy is to update its infrastructure to accommodate for hydrogen  CO2 and biomethane.

Frontiers Media is a publisher of peer-reviewed open access scientific journals currently active in science  technology and medicine. It was founded in 2007. Frontiers is based in Lausanne  Switzerland  with offices in London  Madrid  Seattle and Brussels. In 2022  Frontiers employed more than 1 400 people in 14 countries. All Frontiers journals are published under a Creative Commons Attribution License. Frontiers is the third most-cited and ninth largest research publisher and publishes groundbreaking discoveries by the worlds top experts.

FuelCell Energy (NASDAQ: FCEL) delivers clean solutions for the supply  recovery and storage of energy. It designs  manufactures  undertakes project development  installs  operates and maintains megawatt-scale fuel cell systems  serving utilities  industrial and large municipal power users with solutions including utility-scale and on-site power generation  carbon capture  hydrogen production for transportation and industry  and long-duration energy storage. With installations on three continents and millions of megawatt hours of ultra-clean power produced  FuelCell Energy is a global leader in environmentally responsible power solutions. It is headquartered in the US and serves Europe from Germany and Asia through a South Korean partner.

Garrett Motion is a differentiated technology leader  serving customers worldwide with passenger vehicle  commercial vehicle  aftermarket replacement and performance enhancement solutions. Garrett’s cutting-edge technology enables vehicles to become safer  more connected  efficient and environmentally friendly. Its portfolio of turbocharging  electric boosting and automotive software solutions empowers the transportation industry to redefine and further advance motion.

Digital Currency Groups (DCG) mission is to accelerate the development of a better financial system. It does this by building and supporting bitcoin and blockchain companies through its network  insights and access to capital. As a holding company  DCG has over 85 investments in 25 different countries. It also owns and operates bitcoin brokerage firm Genesis Trading and digital currency asset management firm Grayscale Investments  which manages the Bitcoin Investment Trust. It acquired and expanded CoinDesk  a media  research and events platform.

organization_site: Visit the Guangdong Galanz Enterprise (Group) website
organization_description: Founded in 1978  Galanz Group is an international integrated health home appliance and smart home solutions provider and a leading enterprise with wide international influence in Chinas home appliance industry  focusing on two industries: home appliances and open source chips.

Guidance (formerly known as Tamil Nadu Industrial Guidance and Export Promotion Bureau) was established in 1992 as a non-profit registered society with the objective of attracting major investment proposals into Tamil Nadu. Since its inception  it has attracted more than 300 major investment proposals with an aggregate investment exceeding INR3 trillion ($39 billion).

Integral Petroleum is a trading and logistics company established in 2008 in Geneva  Switzerland. It is active primarily on the markets of the Caspian Sea  Caucasus and Central Asia. Integral Petroleum’s main activities are the trading and supply of petroleum products to the Black Sea and the Mediterranean regions  and the transportation of petroleum products and liquefied petroleum gas (LPG). In 2015  Integral Petroleum became the largest exporter of and logistics provider for crude oil and petroleum products originating from Turkmenistan.

The International Centre for Industrial Transformation (INCIT) is an international organization focused on global thought leadership and innovation in global manufacturing transformation. INCIT is responsible for managing and expanding the Smart Industry Readiness Index (SIRI)  a quantitative framework to evaluate and benchmark manufacturing facilities as companies embark on their Industry 4.0 transformation journey.

Invest Ottawa  an economic development agency for knowledge-based industries in Canada’s capital  facilitates economic growth and job creation  delivering venture development and global expansion programmes and services that catalyse the growth and success of entrepreneurs and firms. These include: small business training; mentorship; acceleration for technology firms; foreign business and investment attraction; local business retention and expansion; commercialization; and marketing Ottawa. From 2012 through 2019  Invest Ottawa supported thousands of start-ups  scaleups and small and medium-sized enterprises; helped firms attract $666 million in capital; contributed to the creation of 9 714 jobs; and attracted $862 million in domestic and foreign investment.

Jabil (NYSE: JBL) is a manufacturing solutions provider that delivers comprehensive design  manufacturing  supply chain and product management services for a wide array of industries  including automotive  transportation  consumer lifestyle and wearable tech  defence and aerospace  connected home and building  industrial and energy  enterprise and infrastructure  retail  healthcare devices  mobility  packaging and printing. Leveraging the power of over 200 000 people across 100 sites strategically located around the world  Jabil simplifies complexity and delivers value  enabling innovation  growth and customer success.
Jahez is a Saudi Platform that specializes in delivering restaurant orders online.

JetLine Group manufactures packaging products  including printed corrugated boxes  cartons  trays  die-cut containers  and packaging designing services. The group houses JetSynthesys  a platform for engaged digital interest-based communities aiming to play a role in the daily digital lives of 1.3 billion Indians and extending it to 7 billion people worldwide. The company has a direct digital community of 63 million consumers and a reach of over 2 billion consumers through its 100 strategic partnerships and 1 000 enterprise and partner network. The company offers personalized experiences in mobile and digital gaming by blending virtual reality  augmented reality and artificial intelligence technologies.

Kaltroco is a private investment company established in 1994 to acquire  support and develop high-quality businesses. Family-owned and controlled by its independent board and managing directors  it is headquartered in Jersey  Channel Islands  with operating teams in St Helier  San Francisco  Nashville  Zurich and Cape Town. Kaltroco holds a portfolio of 33 companies with operations across some 20 countries spanning North America  Europe  Africa and Asia.

organization_name: King Faisal Specialist Hospital and Research Centre
organization_site: Visit the King Faisal Specialist Hospital and Research Centre website

organization_description: Kyndryl is a company that emerged in September 2021 from the spin-off of a large part of the previous IBM (formerly Managed Infrastructure Services  GTS). It covers the operation of information technology infrastructure such as networks  mainframes  data storage  PCs and datacentres for around 4 600 customers in over 100 countries  with annual sales of around $19 billion. Kyndryl has 90 000 employees and serves 75 of the Fortune 100 companies. The company received a total portfolio of over 3 000 patents from IBM.

Lamar Holding specialises in developing and operating projects across the Saudi energy market. Having built an outstanding reputation for delivering Engineering  Procurement and Construction (EPC) oil and gas contracts  our organisation is now successfully expanding to fully capitalise on the opportunities presented across the rapidly developing energy sector in Saudi Arabia. From oil and gas to renewable energy  we are experts in working with our partners to maximise exposure to contract opportunities in the Saudi energy market  and once engaged  we utilise the knowledge of our technical team to develop innovative  practical solutions throughout the procurement and implementation stages. We are proud of our reputation as the strategic partner of choice on Saudi energy contracts.- Lamar Holding for over 14 years has delivered many projects within KSA and the same success formula was applied to win many international projects as well.- With a project pipeline of over USD 6b  Lamar holding is executing revolutionary projects for Saudi Aramco most notably  the construction of a water desalination and a Carbon Capture Project- The group has recently ventured into investing in the GCC start-up ecosystem in the Fintech space with a $400m fund portfolio further boosting the start-up ecosystem in the MENA landscape- Lamar Holding is led by its CEO  Dr. Lina Noureddin who established Lamar after a successful c. 20-year career spanning across business and government. Working closely with strategic clients  including Saudi Aramco. Dr Lina holds a Bachelors in Chemistry and a PhD in Finance.

LeasePlan is one of the world’s leading vehicle leasing companies  with 1.8 million vehicles under care in more than 30 countries  predominantly concentrated in Europe and North America. Its core business involves managing the entire vehicle life cycle for their clients  taking care of all aspects  including vehicle purchase  insurance provision  vehicle maintenance and car re-marketing. It has been doing this for more than 50 years  since its founding in Amsterdam in 1963. LeasePlans mission is to provide what’s next in mobility via an “any car  anytime  anywhere” service.

Lenovo (HKSE: 992) (ADR: LNVGY) is a $70 billion revenue global technology powerhouse  ranked #171 in the Fortune Global 500  employing 75 000 people around the world  and serving millions of customers in 180 markets. Focused on its vision to deliver smarter technology for all  Lenovo has built on its success as one of the world’s largest PC companies by further expanding into key growth areas  including server  storage  mobile  solutions and services. This transformation  together with Lenovo’s world-changing innovation  is building a more inclusive  trustworthy and sustainable digital society for everyone  everywhere.

Founded in 2000  Xian LONGi Silicon Materials Corp. (LONGi Stock) focuses on research and development  production and sales of single-crystal silicon rods and silicon slices. It is among the largest manufacturers of single crystal silicon products in the world. Its products include LONGi single crystal silicon  LERRI PV  LERRI Energy  LONGi Clean energy  and a full industry chain for photovoltaics.

Mari Petroleum is an integrated energy and petroleum company  managing and operating Pakistan’s largest gas reservoir at Mari Gas Field. With 18% market share  it is the second largest gas producer in Pakistan  with cumulative daily production of 100 000 barrels of oil equivalent. The company has an exploration success rate of 70%  compared with industry average of 33% (national) and 14% (international). It plays a pivotal role in ensuring Pakistans food security as 80% of urea production in the country uses the company’s gas. It also supplies gas for power generation and domestic consumers. It is ISO certified.

Midea Group is a leading technology company specializing in robotics  industrial automation  HVAC systems  consumer appliances and smart logistics. It was listed among the Fortune 500 in 2016. Midea operates around the world through 200 subsidiaries  60 overseas affiliates and 10 strategic business units. In 2015  it became the first Chinese household electrical appliance enterprise to obtain Standard & Poors  Fitch and Moodys three major international credit ratings. Midea is a leader in the global home appliance industry and among domestic private enterprises.

Natura &Co is a global  purpose-driven  multi-channel and multi-brand cosmetics group that includes Avon  Natura  The Body Shop and Aesop  four businesses committed to generating positive economic  social and environmental impact. For 130 years  Avon has provided beauty products sold to women  through women. Founded in 1969  Natura was the first publicly listed company to become a B-Corp and in 2015 was named Champion of the Earth. Founded in 1976  The Body Shop is a global beauty brand that seeks to make a positive difference in the world. Aesop was established in 1987 to create skin  hair and body products.

Neste (NESTE  Nasdaq Helsinki) creates solutions to combat climate change and accelerate a shift to a circular economy. It refines waste  residues and innovative raw materials into renewable fuels and sustainable feedstock for plastics and other materials. It is a leading producer of renewable diesel and sustainable aviation fuel. It aims to reduce greenhouse gas emissions with its renewable and circular solutions by at least 20 million tonnes annually by 2030. Neste is included in the Dow Jones Sustainability Indices and the Global 100 list of the world’s most sustainable companies. In 2020  Neste had revenues of €11.8 billion.

NR Instant Produce is a leading South-East Asian food manufacturer and distributor based in Thailand and producing its own signature brands  private label products and co-packing lines. The company has developed from a small factory into a global food manufacturer  with the single-minded strategy to produce high-quality and sustainable food products.

Societatea Nationala Nuclearelectrica (SNN) is a Romanian state-owned nuclear energy company incorporated in 1998 by the reorganization of RENEL. The company is under the authority of the Ministry of Energy; the state has 82.49% of the shares and other shareholders have 17.50% after listing the company on the stock exchange in 2013. The field of activity of Nuclearelectrica is the manufacturing of electricity  thermal energy and nuclear fuel. Nuclearelectrica is the only producer of nuclear energy in Romania.

Oman Global Logistics Group (ASYAD) is a logistics services provider managing a diverse portfolio.
