This includes port management  transportation  shipping  freight forwarding businesses and public services where the governments investments in the sector are guided by ASYAD. It is also a multi-modal service provider through an integrated set of external assets. Its network of partners allows its customers to reach regional and international markets.

OMERS is a defined benefit pension plan for over 485 000 members with $100 billion of net assets invested in public investments  private equity  infrastructure and real estate and has offices in Toronto  Canada; New York  USA; London  United Kingdom; Sydney  Australia; and Singapore.

organization_site: Visit the Petroleo Brasileiro - PETROBRAS website
organization_description: Founded in 1953  Petrobras is Brazils largest oil and gas company and one of the largest in the world. Present in 18 countries  it produced 2.5 million barrels of oil equivalent in 2013. Petrobras has 134 production platforms  15 refineries with a processing capacity of 2.3 million barrels per day  and some 8 600 service stations throughout Brazil and abroad. Sales revenue reached $141.5 billion in 2013.

Pharco is a leading pharmaceutical company in Egypt  with a market share of 13%. It produces 500 different generic and over the counter drugs  as well as patented Hepatitis C cures under the brand name Gratisovir. The Pharco Group is composed of five pharma and two trading companies.

organization_site: Visit the Qatar Development Bank website
organization_description: Qatar Development Banks mission is to develop and empower Qatari entrepreneurs and small and medium-sized enterprises to innovate and compete internationally while contributing to Qatar’s economic diversification and the development of its private sector.

Launched in 2013  Robinhood is one of the fastest growing and leading online retail brokerage firms. The company broke new ground early on by appealing to the Gen-Z and millennial generations by providing a commission-free and easy-to-use mobile interface to buy stocks  options and  later on  cryptocurrencies.

organization_site: Visit the Scan Global Logistics website

organization_description: SES-imagotag is a fast-growing retail tech company. It is listed on the Euronext Paris stock exchange and has revenues of around €423 million. The company is a world leader in smart digital labels and retail internet of things solutions for physical retail  serving over 300 large retailers around the world in Europe  Asia and America. The group’s mission is to support retailers in their digital transformation to help them better manage and control their stores  making them ultra-connected and ultra-efficient  while enabling a truly omnichannel in-store shopping experience.

Saudi Information Technology Company (SITE) is a full-spectrum digital solution provider that fulfils business and operational needs with secure by design services and innovative solutions  and consistently contributes to enriching the tech market through its end-to-end offerings. SITE focuses on enabling a secure digital transformation journey with global standards  as well as contributing to securing cyberspace.

organization_site: Visit the South African Reserve Bank (SARB) website
organization_description: The South African Reserve Bank (SARB) is controlled by the South African Reserve Bank Act  with its shares privately owned and managed by a board of 14 directors  seven of whom  including the governor and three deputy governors  are appointed by the President of South Africa. The remaining directors are elected by the banks shareholders. It regards the achievement and maintenance of financial stability as its primary goal in the South African economic system.

organization_site: Visit the SVOLT Energy Technology website
organization_description: SVOLT  developed from the Battery Unit of Great Wall Motors  is a global high-tech company specializing in the development and manufacture of vehicle battery and energy storage. SVOLT was established in 2018 and is headquartered in Changzhou  Jiangsu Province.

TAE was founded in 1998 to develop the ultimate clean energy solution: a commercial fusion power source that is compact  cost-effective  capable of sustaining the planet for centuries and safe in every way. The patented technologies created for TAE’s unique approach to fusion are now being leveraged for adjacent innovations in electric mobility  power management and more. In all sectors and around the world  TAE is committed to creating a bright future for all.

organization_name: The Investment Promotion Agency of Qatar (IPAQ)
organization_description: The Investment Promotion Agency provides access to Qatar. As a single and complete source for investment solutions  it helps connect clients to the right people  resources and platforms throughout the investment process. It partners closely with clients to identify and expand opportunities  facilitate their long-term success  and enable their business in Qatar’s market and beyond.

Therme Group is a leading global wellness company and an integrator of wellness and entertainment concepts focused on revolutionizing the health and well-being industry. The company emerged from Thermengruppe Josef Wund  which created well-being vacation destinations beginning in 1998. With over 40 million visitors served at 8 locations  the company was restructured in 2017 as Therme Group.

Topsoe is a market leader in the field of heterogeneous catalysis. It supplies catalysts and technologies for the refining industry  to clean power industry flue gases  and for sustainable energy processes. In 2014  its revenue totalled DKK5.685 billion generated by its 2 850 employees around the world.

organization_name: Turkish Employers Association of Metal Industries (MESS)
organization_site: Visit the Turkish Employers Association of Metal Industries (MESS) website
organization_description: The Turkish Employers Association of Metal Industries (MESS) was founded in 1959 to help lead the development of Turkey’s metal industry. Its main activities are to: operationalize the new vision to enable member companies in their digital transformation journey to Industry 4.0 and to maintain its conventional tasks as an industry association. It represents a wide range of metal and related industries  including automotive  moulding  machinery  durable goods  iron and steel  and cabling  with more than 185 000 employees. Its membership includes: Siemens  Bosch  B/S/H  Mercedes Benz  Ford & FIAT (Koc Holding Joint Ventures)  Koç Group  Renault  MAN and Gestamp.
TÜV SÜD tests technical products and consults on environmental and safety standards.

UPS (NYSE: UPS) is a global leader in logistics offering a broad range of solutions  including the transportation of packages and freight  the facilitation of international trade  and the deployment of advanced technology to more efficiently manage the world of business. Headquartered in Atlanta  it serves more than 220 countries and territories worldwide. Through a range of innovative global programmes  the UPS Foundation has developed a multi-sector commitment to urgent humanitarian relief and resilience.

Verisk is a leading data analytics provider serving customers in insurance  energy and specialized markets  and financial services. Using advanced technologies to collect and analyse billions of records  Verisk draws on its data assets and domain expertise to provide innovations that are integrated into customer workflows. Verisk offers predictive analytics and decision support solutions to customers in rating  underwriting  claims  catastrophe and weather risk  global risk analytics  natural resources intelligence  economic forecasting  and other fields. Around the world  it helps customers protect people  property and financial assets. Headquartered in Jersey City  New Jersey  it operates in 30 countries.

Coöperatie VGZ is one of the largest non-profit health insurers in the Netherlands. Through brands such as VGZ and IZA  it offers its more than 4.2 million policyholders what it considers to be the best care at the best price. It has 2 500 employees its head office and various branches in the country.

Xylem is a Fortune 1000 global water technology provider with one mission: to help customers solve water problems through the power of technology and expertise. Together  it is possible to make water more accessible and affordable and communities more resilient. It aims to create a world that is more water-secure and sustainable for all. It has $5.2 billion in revenues.

Yatsen is a leader in the Chinese beauty market. Its mission is to create an exciting new journey of beauty discovery for consumers in China and around the world. Founded in 2016  the company has launched and acquired seven colour cosmetics and skincare brands: Perfect Diary  Little Ondine  Abbys Choice  Galnic  DR.WU (its mainland China business)  Eve Lom and Pink Bear. Leveraging a digitally native direct-to-customer business model  Yatsen has built a platform with core capabilities. As of 31 December 2020  Yatsen had 241 experience stores in over 110 cities in China.

Changsha Zoomlion provides road construction and concrete and hoisting machinery. Its products include concrete manufacture  transportation and pump machinery  high-level road construction and maintenance machinery  construction hoisting machinery  environment sanitation machinery  metal cutting tool works and band saws  and GPS equipment. It exports to East Asia  South Asia  Africa  Europe and the US.

AgroAmerica is a diversified agricultural company with operations in Latin America  the United States and Europe. The company is headquartered in Guatemala and operates in: fresh fruit  vegetable oil and other diversified investments. In fresh fruit  it is one of the largest growers  shippers and distributors of bananas in Latin America  selling 22 million boxes to customers across the USA and Europe. The company farms fresh fruit on 7 000 hectares in Central and South America  mainly in Guatemala  Ecuador and Peru.

organization_site: Visit the Al Sakr for Food Industries website
organization_description: Al Sakr for Food Industries Co. operates in the food industry. It has more than 1 500 employees and six factories in Borg El Arab City  Alexandria  specializing in the manufacture of nectars  processed cheese  pure butter ghee and UHT milk. In addition to the trading section  it is the sole agent of Fonterra Butter in Egypt and many international companies. It imports frozen chicken from Brazil  frozen liver from the US and frozen fish from all over the world.

Ibrahim Fibres is an industrial company in Pakistan with diversified business activities  including polyester yarn production  polyester staple fibre production  financial services and energy. Its vision is to be a sustainable  growth-oriented company and achieve scale to remain competitive in the global economy.

Anglobal is a leading company in Angola in the implementation of infrastructure and development of telecom networks. Anglobal specializes in the construction and installation of telecom sites  the installation and commissioning of network equipment  power systems  fibre optic installation and network operation and maintenance. Its clients are key players in the telecommunications industry in the country. Anglobal has partnerships with suppliers of global brands of equipment and components  which allows the company to guarantee the highest quality standards required in the industry.

Aparna Enterprises is a part of Aparna Group. Founded in 1990  Aparna Enterprises is a market leader in South India through a range of businesses active in building-material products. Associated with several landmark projects for over 3 decades  Aparna Enterprises set benchmarks in technology  research  design and quality. Its aim is to deliver integrated and sustainable building materials solutions that give shape to smarter living spaces and workspaces.

aPriori delivers strategic insights for manufacturers to continuously decide how to design a product and where to manufacture it to optimize cash flow  accelerate revenue growth and improve margins. This unique collaborative platform combines product cost management  design for manufacturability and sustainability  and supplier collaboration capabilities. The platform includes a simulation of more than 450 manufacturing processes and more than 80 regional economic models to yield insights that accelerate time to market by 20% while achieving hundreds of millions of dollars in cost savings and a decreased carbon footprint.

organization_site: Visit the Asia World Group website
organization_description: Established in 1992  Myanmar-based Asia World Company (AWC) is a leading diversified group with its core business in the infrastructure sector. The group has undertaken and completed numerous iconic and critical infrastructure development projects throughout Myanmar. These include roads and highways  airports  ports  power plants and telecommunication towers. Many AWC projects have pioneered safety standards and advanced the infrastructure sector in Myanmar and made lasting contributions to the country and its people. AWC also operates other businesses  such as construction  property development  hospitality  commercial  telecommunications services  retail  insurance  manufacturing  and trading and distribution.

Asistensi is an insurtech making healthcare accessible to all  offerings accessible health plans  including services and insurance coverage that protect against day-to-day ailments  common illnesses and medical emergencies. It supports those who have migrated  so that they can continue caring for their loved ones back home  regardless of the distance. With operations in Mexico  Venezuela  Dominican Republic  Guatemala  Honduras and the Philippines  its goal is to be present en 15 countries by 2025. Asistensi has more than 18 years of experience for peoples health and has alliances to provide insurance for medical emergencies with immediate medical care in Latin America.

With its 140 years of history  Aso currently consists of 84 group companies and more than 10 000 employees. The group is active in healthcare  cement manufacturing  education  property  mining and publishing. Group revenue for the last fiscal year was ¥256.8 billion.

organization_site: Visit the Aster DM Healthcare website
organization_description: Founded in 1987 as a single-doctor practice  Aster DM Healthcare has since grown to include clinics  specialty centres  pharmacies and hospitals in the GCC  India and the Philippines. It owns and operates a network of more than 290 establishments in nine countries  covering clinics  hospitals  pharmacies and a modern medical city in India. Its brands include ASTER  MEDCARE  ACCESS  ASTER Medcity  and ASTER MIMS. It is also involved in education through DM WIMS Medical College and Hospital. It has 14 000 employees.

organization_site: Visit the Aurec Capital Group website
organization_description: Founded in the 1960s  Aurec Capital is an entrepreneurial single-family office headquartered in Israel with overseas offices in New York and in Berlin. Over the years Aurec Capital has founded and invested in a number of businesses across sectors  including TMT  insurance  infrastructure  and venture capital. Aurec Real Estate  the property investment arm of Aurec Capital  is invested in properties in several countries in Europe and in the United States. Its portfolio includes office  retail and residential assets.

Axtria is a global software and data analytics provider to the life sciences industry. It combines process knowledge of life science commercial operations  data analytics and software. With consulting and cloud-based solutions  it enables life science companies to digitally transform their data into operations journey insights. The result is a future-ready outlook with improvement in sales and marketing effectiveness via data-driven decision-making  increases in efficiency and organizational agility. With customers in over 30 countries  Axtria is transforming product commercialization by turning real-world and commercial data into insights  enabling contemporary commercial operations and powering real-time decision-making.

Bacalia Group is a private investment holding investing in infrastructure companies and sustainable technologies. It has its headquarters in San Juan and is present in New York  San Francisco  Switzerland and Panama.

organization_site: Visit the Bank of Qingdao website
organization_description: Bank of Qingdao is a joint-stock city commercial bank headquartered in Qingdao  with approval from Peoples Bank of China on 21 November 1996. The bank has more than 2 700 employees  total assets of RMB169 billion and total deposits of RMB103 billion. As of the end of June 2015  the bank had 86 branches and sub-branches  mainly operating in Shandong Province in China. Top-three shareholders are Haier Group  Intesa Sanpaolo and Qingdao Conson Industrial Co.
Biomet produces liquid biomethane (bio-LNG) from urban organic waste and animal manure.

Blendhub provides unique services for developing and producing powder-based food and nutrition. With production hubs in Spain  India  Mexico and Colombia  Blendhub helps food and beverage companies to design  source  blend and distribute their powder products all over the world with the highest safety and quality standards. Using proprietary technology for ingredient sourcing  high-precision blending and trade analysis  Blendhub enables customers to offer healthy and safe food at the best possible prices for the end consumer. This innovative business model brings Blendhub to fulfill its main purpose: to make food available to more people  in more places.

Bloomage BioTechnology Corporation is dedicated to the development of the biopharmaceutical field internationally. It has some 10 subsidiaries engaged in pharmaceutical production  sales and investment. The company listed on the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong on 3 October 2008 (stock code: 00963.HK).

organization_site: Visit the Blue Horizon International website
organization_description: BHI is a healthcare consulting company with a unique concept that combines treatment  research  and philanthropy. BHI provides the highest quality care and service available in surgical and medical treatments globally  the most advanced technologies currently available in areas such as stem cell therapy  regenerative medicine  immunocancer therapy  and also provides resources for those who are medically underserved. BHI is committed to providing quality doctors and surgeon  advanced technology  and superior quality of care in each country we serve. Our extensive network of healthcare professionals  scientists  Board of Governors  management team  and growing international affiliations allow BHI the ability to comply with the highest international accreditation standards  such as those of the Joint Commission International (JCI) and the International Society for Quality in Health Care (ISQua).

Founded in 1987  Brunswick Group is an international public relations and corporate communications agency with more than 15 offices worldwide. The company provides communication services in media and investor relations  regulatory issues  mergers and acquisitions  employee communications  crisis management  and corporate campaigns. It owns specialist companies including Brunswick Arts (catering to museums  schools and charitable foundations)  MerchantCantos (serving European clientele)  the Lincoln Centre (London customers)  and Trinity (offers presentation and media coaching).

Active in standards and standardization  business advisory services  systems and products assessment  conformity inspection  and testing and certification. It has a strong presence in the UK and US and is focusing on expansion in east and south Asia and mainland Europe.

BTS is a global professional services firm supporting world-leading businesses with strategy execution  leadership development and sales transformation. It focuses on the people side of strategy  turning strategy into action and results. It designs powerful experiences that have a profound and lasting impact on people and their careers  inspiring new ways of thinking  building critical capabilities and unleashing business success. BTS is headquartered in Stockholm  Sweden  with some 450 professionals in 32 offices located on six continents.

organization_site: Visit the Byco Petroleum Pakistan website
organization_description: Byco Petroleum Pakistan is engaged in the business of oil refining  petroleum retail marketing  oil infrastructure  oil trading  and petrochemical manufacturing and sales.

Carson Cumberbatch is involved in breweries  palm oil plantations  investment portfolio management  unit trusts – private equity funds  property development and hotels. The company is active in palm oil plantations  breweries and portfolio management locally and regionally in Singapore  Indonesia  Malaysia and India.

Codewise is a fast-growing company in Europe and one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe  the Middle East and Africa. Codewise achieved 167% year-on-year growth. It is headquartered in Poland  with offices in London  New York and Santa Monica  and 200 employees in total. Codewise is the industry’s first provider of artificial intelligence powered online ad measurement and management solutions for digital marketers. The company manages more than $2.5 billion in digital ad spending for some of the world’s largest brands.

organization_site: Visit the CH. Karnchang Public Company Limited (CK) website
organization_description: CH. Karnchang is one of Thailands leading general contractors and basic infrastructure developers. It has more than 40 years of successful experience in the construction business of large-scale infrastructure  building complex and general civil works. The company has earned prestige for its high work execution capability since it was established in 1972. Besides construction  it has been investing since 1987 in the governments concession projects to expand its operations and generate long-term steady income.

organization_name: Chi Forest (Beijing) Food Technology Group Co.  Ltd.
organization_site: Visit the Chi Forest (Beijing) Food Technology Group Co.  Ltd. website
organization_description: Chi Forest (Beijing) Food Technology Group is a Chinese food and beverage enterprise dedicated to creating healthy and good products for a better life. The company was established in 2016 with the corporate vision of "integrating global resources to create good products with love for global users"  and has successively won titles such as national high-tech enterprises.
Chiba Bank (Kabushiki-gaisha Chiba Ginkō) (TYO: 8331) is one of the largest banks in Chiba Prefecture  Japan. Listed on the Nikkei 225  it has branches in Osaka  New York City  London  and Hong Kong.

organization_site: Visit the China Bohai Bank website
organization_description: China Bohai Bank is a national joint-stock commercial bank based in Tianjin and the first of its kind to bring in overseas investors. Established in 2006  it has a registered capital of RMB5 billion. It has eight branches and 15 sub-branches in cities in China. It also acts as a correspondent bank from 576 head offices and branches of nearly 300 banks worldwide.

Chindata Group (NASDAQ: CD) is a leading carrier-neutral hyperscale datacentre solution provider in Asia-Pacific emerging markets and a first mover in building next-generation hyperscale data centres in markets in China  India and South-East Asia  focusing on the whole life cycle of facility planning  investment  design  construction and operation of ecosystem infrastructure in the information technology (IT) industry. Chindata Group provides its clients with business solutions in major countries and regions in emerging markets in Asia-Pacific  including asset-heavy ecosystem chain services such as industrial bases  data centres  and value-added network and IT services.

organization_site: Visit the Chip Mong Group website
organization_description: Chip Mong Group was established in 1982 by local investors in Cambodia. The company distributes construction materials and consumer products and has a factory for concrete and beer. Chip Mong Group has invested in the concrete business under the name of Chip Mong Concrete (CMC) since 2007. It has invested in the beer business in Cambodia under the name Khmer Brewery. It also assists educational institutions by providing scholarships to engineering students at the Institute Technology of Cambodia.

ClimatePartner is a business solution provider for climate protection. It develops complex industry solutions  from carbon footprinting to carbon offsetting  to fully integrate into the value proposition of companies. It is present in 25 countries and a market leader in selected industries.

Coyote Bioscience (Beijing) is a  innovative Chinese high-tech company that has been engaged in molecular diagnostics for over 10 years  in particular fast nucleic acid detection technology for pathogenic microorganisms. So far  Coyote has applied for 83 domestic and international patents. As an international high-tech enterprise and a work base for academicians and experts  Coyote focuses on point-of-care testing (POCT) and research and development of its novel genetic molecular diagnostic platform.

organization_site: Visit the Crown Agents Bank website
organization_description: Crown Agents Bank is a United Kingdom-regulated bank that connects emerging and frontier markets to the rest of the world  using foreign exchange (FX) and payments technology. It is transforming the way payments and FX move through emerging markets  reducing friction so that more money gets to those who need it. Emerging markets payments are usually challenging  expensive  unreliable and opaque. Its solutions help fix these pain points. Ultimately  it connects traditionally hard-to-reach regions to global financial infrastructure  giving access to the best prices and the fastest  most reliable settlement.

Dabur is the flagship business of the Burman family  which has interests and investments in insurance  financial services  healthcare  consumer  media and property. It is the fourth largest FMCG company in India  with revenues of over $1.1 billion and a market capitalization of $4 billion. It has over 125 years of experience  is the worlds largest Ayurvedic and natural healthcare company  and operates in hair care  oral care  healthcare  skin care  homecare and foods.

Dalberg is global group of companies whose mission is to mobilize effective responses to the worlds most pressing issues  in particular those that affect people in developing countries. Founded in 2001  it maintains a commitment to bringing innovation and private sector approaches to international development. Starting as a strategy consulting firm  the group now includes investment advisory  research and implementation businesses  operating in 17 locations worldwide.

organization_site: Visit the Dalian Bingshan Group website
organization_description: Dalian Bingshan Group has 35 subsidiaries  assets of more than RMB10 billion and 12 000 employees. It is active in industrial refrigeration  food freezing and preservation  central air conditioning  petrochemical equipment and refrigeration engineering parts. With a focus on the cooling and heating industry chain  the company provides complete solutions for its customers  from design  fabrication  installation and commissioning  to training and after-sales service. Its comprehensive service network reaches customers in more than 60 countries and regions worldwide.

organization_site: Visit the Dalian Commodity Exchange website
organization_description: Founded on 28 February 1993  Dalian Commodity Exchange (DCE) is one of the four futures exchanges under the supervision and administration of the China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC) upon the approval of the State Council. It is the only futures exchange in North-East China. DCE has listed a total of 16 futures products  including corn  corn starch  no. 1 soybean  no. 2 soybean  soybean meal  soybean oil  RBD palm olein  egg  blockboard  fibreboard  LLDPE  PVC  PP  coke  coking coal and iron ore.

organization_site: Visit the Dalian Pengsheng Group website
organization_description: Dalian Pengsheng Group is a real estate enterprise founded in 1993 that has developed many classic residences and public construction projects  including Pengsheng Garden  Pengshun Garden  Penghui Square and Penghui New Century.

Daojia Group is an online service platform invested in by 58 Group. It provides users with professional  convenient and secured and standardized home service  including three major services: home cleaning  beauty and moving. Daojia Group consists of three businesses: 58 JIAZHENG (domestic services)  Kuaigou Taxi and 58 Daojia platform. Daojia Group has more than 6 000 employees. The services it provides cover six countries and regions and more than 300 cities. It has 1.5 million screened and certified registered labourers providing more than 570 million hours of services to over 20 million families.

Dataminr has been recognized as one of the world’s leading businesses in artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning innovation  pioneering groundbreaking technology for detecting  classifying and determining the significance of public information in real-time. In 2016  CNBC recognized Dataminr as one of the world’s 50 most disruptive private technology companies. Dataminr is headquartered in New York and has over 400 employees.

DatVietVAC Group Holdings was founded in 1994. It is the first privately owned advertising and media corporation in Viet Nam  developing from the ground up to become the largest media and entertainment group in the country. The groups businesses include brand architecture and consultancy  media planning and buying  an international and Vietnamese drama and non-drama TV content provider  and out-of-home and TV network investment and management. DatVietVAC has been focusing on the television business  including free-to-air  satellite and cable TV channels in the country.

Founded in 1977  Descon Engineering is active in the engineering  chemical and power industries. It is based in Pakistan and has locations in the United Arab Emirates  Saudi Arabia  Oman and Afghanistan. Its engineering business provides design  construction  manufacturing and maintenance services for industrial and infrastructure projects  including turnkey services. Its chemical business manufactures chemicals for the paint  paper and textile industries  and its power generation business has a 450-megawatt power plant in Pakistan. It employs over 20 000 people from 20 nationalities.

organization_name: Diverse Manufacturing Supply Chain Alliance (DMSCA) Supplier Development Foundation
organization_site: Visit the Diverse Manufacturing Supply Chain Alliance (DMSCA) Supplier Development Foundation website
organization_description: The Diverse Manufacturing Supply Chain Alliance (DMSCA) is a non-profit 501 (c) 6 compliant membership trade association based in Washington DC whose mission is to develop an ecosystem of supply-ready diverse manufacturing suppliers enabled to compete and continuously improve in both linear supply chains and data-driven Industry 4.0 digital supply networks. It runs the Corporate Mentoring Program (CMP) Ten-Step Playbook supplier development system for supplier performance certification and provides a supplier directory and portal to establish trust-based relationships to make sourcing decisions.

organization_site: Visit the EastGarden International Group website
organization_description: EastGarden International Groups brand Florasis explores wisdoms in traditional beauty rituals  inherits the philosophy of Chinese aesthetics and adopts modern technologies in creating our cosmetic products  which features nourishment from flower and natural essences  unity of makeup and skincare  promotion of both inner and outer beauty and excellence of craftsmanship.

organization_site: Visit the Elite Education Group website
organization_description: Elite Education Group endows and manages a portfolio of educational services and entities ranging from the charitable to the preparatory. These include: Elite Educational Institute (ElitePrep - test and academic preparatory institute); Elite Alpha Academy (English language learners programme); Elite International Consulting (high school and college application consulting services); Elite School of Creative Arts and Athletics (next generation high school with emphasis on creativity); EEI School of Music and EEI Records (music production and recording division); Center for Future Global Leaders (non-profit promoting student leadership and achievement); and Elite Open School (WASC accredited international middle and high school).

A pioneer in online leadership development for enterprises  ExecOnline has delivered leadership development training to 65 000 leaders in over 100 countries  and meaningful impact for enterprises through partnerships with the world’s top business schools. Founded in 2012  ExecOnline’s business school partnerships include Berkeley Haas  Chicago Booth  Columbia  UVA Darden School of Business  Tuck at Dartmouth  Duke CE  IMD  Ivey  MIT Sloan  Stanford GSB  Wharton and Yale. As a Forbes Technology Company to Watch  ExecOnline’s proprietary Learn by Doing with Impact methodology combines market-driven input with an applied learning approach for maximum impact aligned to what leaders and their organizations need.

Explorance is a provider of people insight solutions. The company empowers organizations with actionable decision-making by measuring students and employees needs  expectations  skills  knowledge and competencies. Through scalable automation and expert-based services  it facilitates continuous improvement and accelerates the insight-to-action cycle  leading to personal growth and organizational agility. Founded in 2003  Explorance is headquartered in Montreal with business units in Chicago  Chennai  Melbourne  Amman and London. The comapny works with 35% of the Fortune 100 and 25% of the top higher education institutions  including 8 of the world’s top 10 business schools. Explorance has clients in more than 40 countries.

organization_site: Visit the Far East Holding Group website
organization_description: Far East Holding Group was founded in 1990. After five successful restructurings  it has developed into a large-scale privately owned corporation covering three main areas  namely smarter energy  real estate and investment. The current annual revenue of the group is nearly RMB30 billion  with over RMB20 billion of capital  and the brand value is RMB28.15 billion. The group has nearly 10 000 employees.
Fingerprint Cards AB (Fingerprints™) is the world’s leading biometrics company  with its roots in Sweden.

Flottweg is a family-owned company specializing in separation technology. It invests in new technologies and products to stay a step ahead of the market at all times. Its success is based on competence  responsibility and respect. These values determine its day-to-day work  the way it approaches challenges  and its behaviour with customers  business partners and colleagues.

organization_site: Visit the Foherb(Tianjin)Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd website
organization_description: Fohoway Group  founded in 2007  is a high-tech biotechnology multinational group integrating research  production  sales and service of healthcare products. With the mission of promoting health culture and benefiting human health  combining the latest research achievements of modern life science  Fohoway Group established three health-preserving theories: diet regimen  behavioural regimen and psychological regimen. Fohoway Group  a high-tech biotechnology enterprise  has brought healthcare solutions to hundreds of millions of people. It brings together Chinese medicine health experts  biologists and processing engineers  and has an including R&D centre  a test centre and a laboratory centre.

organization_site: Visit the FSN Capital Partners website
organization_description: Established in 1999  FSN Capital Partners is a leading Northern European private equity firm and investment adviser to the FSN Capital Funds  with €4 billion under management. FSN Capital Funds make control investments in growth-oriented Northern European companies to support further growth and to transform companies into more sustainable  competitive  international and profitable entities. FSN Capital has a team of more than 70 professionals in Oslo  Stockholm  Copenhagen and Munich  in addition to 9 executive advisers with extensive industry experience.

Gemini Corporation is a world-leading circular economy market maker  recycling 2 million tonnes of material annually  including 1 billion PET bottles  50 million tyres  1.5 million refrigerators and 300 000 cars. Founded in 1989  Gemini has 500 employees in 33 offices and operates across 60 countries worldwide. Its vision is “a consumer-driven circular economy for a sustainable world.” An official supporter of the Global Treaty on Plastic Pollution  Gemini has been a global innovator on EPR and plastic credits and helps governments and organizations worldwide reduce their plastic footprint. Unigem  its blockchain-based mobile app  assures waste supply chain transparency for brand owners.

Graphjet Technology aims to be a global leader in generating value by producing innovative  green and low-cost graphene  graphite and graphene-based anode materials. It was incorporated in 2019 in Kuala Lumpur and has a valuation of $1.5 billion. Its patented technology to recycle palm kernel shells generated in the production of palm seed oil produces single-layer graphene and artificial graphite for electric vehicle (EV) batteries  medical devices and home appliances. Graphjet’s graphene is of higher quality than traditional graphene at a price that is 80% lower than the market and produces 70% less CO2.

organization_site: Visit the Green Delta Insurance website
organization_description: Green Delta Insurance is a leading private non-life insurance company in Bangladesh. The company started operations in 1986  with a paid-up capital of BDT30 million. It now has more than BDT807 million  with a credit rating of AAA and ST1. Green Delta is also the first insurance company in Bangladesh to have an equity partnership with the World Bank Group’s International Finance Corporation (IFC). It has 43 branches throughout the country and the largest market share in the non-life insurance sector – 13% – as of 31 December 2017.

Founded in 1868  the Greiner Group started as a cork producer in Germany  before moving into plastic and foam production in the 20th century. Now specializing in different business areas in the plastics industry  Greiner is still a family-owned company. Diversification  innovation and globalization characterize Greiner’s success. Greiner is active in the packaging  furniture and automotive industries  in the medical technology and life science sectors  and in profile extrusion. Greiner Holding is composed of Greiner Packaging International  Greiner Bio-One International  Greiner Foam International and Greiner Extrusion Group. They operate in 130 locations worldwide  with a turnover of €1.5 billion.

Guardant Health is a diagnostics company focused on fundamentally changing the way cancer is managed. The companys proprietary technology enables comprehensive real-time monitoring of cancer through a simple blood test. Current treatment often requires biopsies  which are risky  costly and consequently cannot be used to capture genetic changes that typically lead to treatment failure. The companys technology enables physicians to finally see these genetic changes in real-time and treat them with the appropriate therapies.

As an industry leader in the provision of Digital Solutions  H3C offers a full portfolio of digital infrastructure products  spanning compute  storage  networking  5G  security and related domains  and provides a comprehensive one-stop digital platform that includes cloud computing  big data  artificial intelligence (AI)  industrial internet  information security  intelligent connectivity  AI vision  and edge computing  as well as end-to-end technical services. It had RMB40 billion in revenue in 2020.

Since its founding in 2011  Hengchang focuses on development in the field of internet finance. Based on its fully fledged risk control system  it offers a wide range of financial services to customers  including wealth management consulting  loan consultation  credit risk assessment and management. Hengchang promotes the development of inclusive finance and helps tens of millions small and microenterprise owners  wage earners  farmers  people in the agriculture industry and rural areas to solve financial demands amounting to tens of billions of RMB. The company serves customers in 300 cities in 20 provinces and autonomous regions. Hengchang is headquartered in Beijing.

Holman Enterprises  headquartered in Mount Laurel  New Jersey  is an international automotive services company. Beginning in 1924 as a single Ford dealership  Holman has evolved to encompass six business segments that support several diverse sectors of the automotive market.

organization_site: Visit the Honoris United Universities website
organization_description: Honoris United Universities is a pan-African private higher education network committed to transforming lives through relevant education for lifetime success. Honoris comprises a community of 61 000 students on 70 campuses  learning centres and online in 10 African countries and 32 cities. The network comprises 15 institutions: multidisciplinary universities  specialized schools  technical and vocational institutes  contact  distance and online institutions. Students experience exclusive partnerships and exchange programmes with 190 universities in Europe  the United States and Asia. It offers degrees in medicine  health sciences  engineering  information technology  business  law  architecture  creative arts  fashion and design  media  political science and education.

As a global system supplier for the mobility industry  for manufacturing and for life sciences and research applications  the Hübner Group is a worldwide leader in gangway systems for buses and railway vehicles (mobility)  a well-recognized specialist in sophisticated elastomer solutions and products  insulation and composite materials (material solutions)  as well as a supplier for applications in the fields of laser  terahertz and high-frequency technologies (photonics). The group employs more than 3 500 people worldwide. In addition to the headquarters in Kassel  Germany  Hübner has established more than 30 locations around the world.

Imperial Logistics is a provider of integrated market access and logistics solutions  particularly in Africa and Europe. With a focus on five key industries – healthcare  consumer  automotive  chemicals and industrial – the company is ranked among the top 30 global logistics providers and listed on the JSE in South Africa. Imperial seeks to leverage new technology to deliver innovative  end-to-end solutions. With its significant African footprint and international expertise  and with the support of its 25 000 employees  Imperials goal is to connect Africa and the world and to improve peoples lives with access to quality products and services.

IN4.OS is a privately held Industry 4.O focused organization that is delivering holistic and scalable solutions to companies in the strategic sectors. By harnessing the power of artificial intelligence  digital technologies  cyber-physical systems and talent development  it is assisting these companies as they make the leap to the Fourth Industrial Revolution (Industry 4.0) and develop the next generation of US and global manufacturing  which is future-focused  resilient  location-agnostic (terrestrial and extra-terrestrial)  sector agnostic and which is democratizing work.

organization_site: Visit the Jetex Flight Support website
organization_description: Jetex Flight Support provides operational services to airline operators in Africa  the Middle East and the Far East. It offers air traffic clearance  flight planning  documentation processing  fuel delivery and ground support services. The company is based in Dubai  United Arab Emirates  with a fixed base operator location in Marseille  France. Jetex is a global leader in executive aviation and operates fixed-base operations and ground support stations in more than 30 countries. It has state-of-the-art operations centres in Dubai  Miami and Beijing. Jetexs clientele includes owners and operators of business jets for corporate  commercial and personal air travel.

Kaizen Institute is a global organization that provides consulting and training services to companies represented in the Americas  Europe  Middle East  Asia-Pacific and Africa. Its portfolio encompasses the areas of consulting  training and education  benchmark tours  and qualification. Kaizen Institute helps clients master their gemba (the place where value is created)  establishing Continuous Improvement capabilities throughout the organization. It supports companies of all sizes and sectors  as well as private and public service organizations.

Kale Group pioneered the formation of the ceramics industry in Turkey and has become an industry giant internationally with its investments. It has grown through investments in machinery and equipment manufacturing  defence  chemistry  electrical appliances  energy  information technology (IT)  transportation  tourism and food industries. Kale Group comprises 17 companies and has over 5 000 employees in Turkey  Italy and Russia. Kale Group is Europes third and the worlds 12th largest ceramics tile manufacturer. Kale Group provides its products to consumers in over 100 countries via more than 400 sales points.

organization_site: Visit the Keidanren (Japan Business Federation) website
organization_description: Keidanren (Japan Business Federation) is a comprehensive economic organization. Its membership is comprised of 1 329 representative companies from Japan  109 nationwide industrial associations  and 47 regional economic organizations. Keidanrens mission as a comprehensive economic organization is to draw upon the vitality of corporations  individuals and local communities to support corporate activities that contribute to the self-sustaining development of the Japanese economy and improvement in the quality of life for the Japanese people.

organization_site: Visit the King & Wood Mallesons website
organization_description: King & Wood Mallesons is one of the first partnership law firms in China. Established in 1993  it has headquarters in Beijing and offices in Shanghai  Shenzhen  Chengdu  Guangzhou  Chongqing  Xian  Hangzhou  Tianjin  Hong Kong  Tokyo and Silicon Valley. It has more than 600 lawyers  patent attorneys and legal professionals providing legal services.

KOIS  an international impact investing company  specializes in asset management and finance services. Its mission is to turn projects with high societal and environmental impact into tangible investment propositions for public and private sector clients. KOIS provides services in innovative finance  from advisory to structuring  and fund management to private  public and philanthropic sector clients. Through impact finance  it collaborates to scale financing solutions serving both impact and profit. KOIS has structured impact bonds on employment generation for fragile communities in Europe  refugee employment in the Middle East and child protection in Europe and humanitarian impact.

ION Group unifies customer operations from front to back and simplifies them throughout asset classes. Its workflow automates the complete trade life cycle and delivers actionable insights. Its solutions provide critical information in real time so clients can understand the needs of customers better  manage risk proactively  and anticipate issues before they become a problem. It has created the standard for resilience  performance and innovation in capital markets technology. This means lower costs  greater business agility  and excellence in customer service.

organization_site: Visit the Manipal Health Enterprises website

organization_description: Martin Dow is a leading multinational healthcare group in Pakistan. The group operates six manufacturing facilities: four in Pakistan and two in France. The company markets over 150 brands and has a 4 000-strong workforce globally. Martin Dow manufactures high quality pharmaceutical and nutraceutical products. It is truly diversified and is leading in pharmaceuticals  nutraceuticals  chemicals  diagnostics and contract development and manufacturing. In 2013  Martin Dow Group was recognized as a Global Growth Company by the World Economic Forum.

Founded 20 years ago  Meridian is a leader in customer service  innovative use of modern technology  and corporate social responsibility. Meridian has seen positive growth for the past 10 consecutive years and has emerged as a key player in improving the community and generating economic growth in the private sector. Beginning with just four family members  Meridian currently employs a staff of over 500. As a responsible employer  Meridian helps develop the skills and loyalty of its own workforce as well as that of Kosovo’s population as a whole. Meridian is also committed to a healthy and progressively developing Kosovo community.

Midis Group is a major information technology integrator and service provider throughout the Middle East  Central and Eastern Europe  Africa and Central Asia. Founded in 1967  it has around $3.8 billion in annual sales and nearly 4 000 employees in over 30 countries. It aims to serve emerging markets with integrity and expertise using the worlds major technology brands.

Mozilla is a global  non-profit organization dedicated to making the web better. It emphasizes principle over profit and works with a passionate worldwide community of technologists  thinkers and builders to develop open standards and create open source products like Mozilla Firefox. Currently half a billion people around the world use Firefox in one of 89 languages. More than 50% of global Firefox users use non-English versions. Some 40% of the code base has been written by volunteers.

organization_site: Visit the Nanban ESG Solutions website
organization_description: Nanban has been supporting green initiatives through many of its flagship projects  such as Mothers for Mother Nature  helping farmers transition to the natural way of farming  women empowerment projects  and many initiatives through its foundation activities. Nanban is committed to continuing to expand the ways it can help clients with sustainable investing. It has the power to help create a sustainable and more prosperous world for all through its role in the financial system by allocating capital to areas that seek to both deliver social value and maximize investment.

organization_site: Visit the Nishith Desai Associates website
organization_description: Nishith Desai Associates is among Asia’s most innovative law firms and a go-to specialist for companies around the world  looking to conduct businesses in India and for Indian companies considering business expansion abroad. Its Blue Sky Thinking and Research Campus  Imaginarium Aligunjan  is an international institution dedicated to designing a premeditated future with an embedded strategic foresight capability. The firm has been consistently ranked as one of the Most Innovative Law Firms worldwide and has received the Financial Times RSG award 4 times in a row  (2014-2017) as the Most Innovative Indian Law Firm.

organization_site: Visit the Oisix ra daichi Inc. website
organization_description: Oisix.daichi is an online grocery company providing natural foods. It has 110 000 subscribers each month and had more than $165 million in annual sales in 2014. Target customers are expecting mothers and women with small children. It is the largest internet-based food retailer in Japan and has won the Japan Online Shopping Prize  Grand Prix (2005)  and the Porter Prize (2008)  among others.

Optel is a leading multinational provider of traceability systems. Its mission is to create a better world through intelligent supply chains. The company’s solutions ensure the quality of consumer health products and help stop counterfeiting of pharmaceuticals and medical devices worldwide. Optel is also adapting its innovative technologies to create efficiencies in other sectors  from health-related industries to smart manufacturing. With the acquisitions of Verify Brand and GeoTraceability  Optel offers end-to-end traceability solutions  providing visibility across the entire supply chain  allowing industries to measure  inspect  control and track all elements to improve quality and make better use of resources.

organization_site: Visit the Organic and Beyond website
organization_description: Organic and Beyond was founded in 2007. The company engages in organic food cultivation  production  distribution and home delivery service. It is committed to providing consumers with high-quality  healthy and reliable organic products. It has provided organic food home delivery services to over 500 000 families in Beijing  Shanghai  Guangzhou  Shenzhen  Hangzhou and Tianjin. In 2012  it set up the Organic and Beyond Fund to promote exchanges and cooperation between China and other countries.

organization_site: Visit the PALO IT Group website
organization_description: PALO IT is a global innovation consultancy and agile software development company dedicated to helping organizations embrace tech as a force for good. It works with clients to rapidly launch products and services  create new business models  and prepare leadership and culture for the future. It is committed to helping businesses transform to better the world.

Perfect World aims to develop high-quality games and set up a long-term goal to promote Chinese culture worldwide. It has grown into an online game platform service provider focusing on the integration of research and development  operations  marketing and services. In July 2007  it successfully listed on the NASDAQ stock market in the USA (stock code: PWRD).

With over 30 years of experience  the Phongsavanh Group of companies is a leading business conglomerate in Lao Peoples Democratic Republic. Its businesses include banking and finance  construction  petroleum products  aviation  and logistics and transport. The Phongsavanh Group is 100% privately owned and was established in 1977. The group has strong partnerships with Viet Nam  Cambodia  China  Russia and Dubai in the exchange of merchandise and investments. It has representative offices in Viet Nam  China  Thailand  Singapore  Malaysia and Myanmar.

organization_site: Visit the Pinheiro Neto Advogados website
organization_description: Pinheiro Neto Advogados is an independent full-service firm based in Brazil specializing in multi-disciplinary deals and in translating the Brazilian legal environment for the benefit of foreign clients. With clients in almost 60 countries  the firm was recognized in 2014 by the Brazilian Government as the a leading exporter of legal services from Brazil. Pinheiro Neto Advogados is one of only a handful of firms partnering worldwide with Thomson Reuters and Samsungs legal technology innovation research project. The firm has grown organically and developed a distinctive  tight-knit culture  with a low associate-to-partner ratio.

organization_site: Visit the Power Dekor Group website
organization_description: Established in 1995  Power Dekor Group was the first enterprise to introduce laminate flooring in China. It has headquarters in Shanghai and has become the largest wood flooring company in China  ranking at the top of this industry for 13 consecutive years. In 2009  the value of its brand increased to RMB7.815 trillion.

Puravankara is a real estate conglomerate that commenced operations in Mumbai and has established a significant presence in Bangalore  Kochi  Chennai  Coimbatore  Hyderabad  Mysore and overseas in Dubai  Colombo and Saudi Arabia. It focuses on investments in resources and infrastructure geared toward innovation and customer-centric digital transformation. It is one of the first developers to obtain foreign direct investment in the Indian real estate industry through its joint venture with Singapore-based Keppel Land. The joint venture company  Keppel Puravankara Development  has housing projects across the country. Puravankara has 62 residential projects and 5 commercial projects spanning 3.5 million square metres.

organization_site: Visit the Qatar Financial Centre Regulatory Authority website
organization_description: The Qatar Financial Centre Regulatory Authority is the independent regulator of the Qatar Financial Centre (QFC)  established to authorize and regulate firms and individuals conducting financial services in or from the QFC. The QFC is designed to attract international financial services institutions and multinational corporations and to encourage participation in the market for financial services in Qatar and the region.
Quotient is a commercial-stage diagnostics company that is fully committed to delivering solutions that reshape the way diagnostics is practiced.

Remixpoint engages in the development and sale of energy management solutions and energy-saving support consulting services in Japan. It also sells energy-saving equipment and purchases and sells electric power. In addition  the company engages in the development and sale of used car assessment systems; buying and selling used cars; and consulting related to buying and selling used cars. Further  the company engages in the management of transaction currency exchange and accommodation facility planning  development  design and operation.

Responsible Cybers mission is to empower companies to create safer online communities through sustainable cybersecurity services and products. It aims to help companies mitigate cyber-risk without exhausting people and to invest resources effectively to safeguard their current and future cybersecurity posture. It is based in Singapore and has a capital of SGD120 000 and a valuation of SGD7 million as at April 2020. The company’s corporate shareholders include Singtel Innov8 and NUS Enterprise.

Ricardo is a global strategic  environmental and engineering consulting company listed on the London Stock Exchange. With over 100 years of engineering excellence and employing close to 3 000 employees in more than 20 countries  it provides expertise in delivering innovative cross-sector sustainable outcomes to support the energy transition  scarce resources  environmental services and safe and smart mobility. Its global team of consultants  environmental specialists  engineers and scientists support customers in solving the most complex and dynamic challenges to help achieve a safe and sustainable world.

Risk Insights is an established risk management advisory and consultancy boutique. The singular focus of Risk Insights is to serve its clients with distinction and to support organizational transformation in order to unlock value creation in the organization.

Established in 1899  ROHTO Pharmaceutical Co. is the largest company in Japans OTC drugs market. It is a leader in the eye drops market  commanding a 40% share. Overseas expansion picked up in 1988 with the acquisition of Mentholatum in the US  and 40% of total sales now come from overseas. Its skincare and cosmetics businesses have grown rapidly in recent years.

Since its inception in 1932 by Annie and Nestor Schiller  Septodont has developed  manufactured and distributed a wide range of high-quality products for dental professionals. From local anaesthetic cartridges  topical gels  dental needles  obturation powders and pastes to innovative restorative solutions  Septodont meets needs in pain control  endodontics  restorative dentistry  infection control and more. The company employs over 1 000 people  has manufacturing plants in France  North America and India  and has an international distribution network covering more than 150 countries.

ShuKun Technology  founded in 2017 in China  is a global leader in providing artificial intelligence (AI)-powered medical imaging solutions for disease screening  diagnosis and therapy selection and planning. ShuKun has developed a DigitalDoc platform that analyses medical imaging data and assists human doctors in the clinical process. Together with DigitalDoc  doctors are able to significantly accelerate their diagnostic efficiency by up to ten times  improve accuracy and consistency  and deliver greater clinical value. More than 1 800 hospitals in China have adopted DigitalDoc products.

organization_site: Visit the Sincerity International Group website
organization_description: Founded in 2003  Sincerity Group is a multinational enterprise specializing in motorcycles  automobiles and accessories through R&D  marketing  network channels  and brand construction. Its 11 subsidiaries are located in the West African countries of Togo  Ghana  Burkina Faso  Côte dIvoire and Mali  and in Brazil. It has two self-owned brands  APSONIC and REDFOX. Its business concept is "meet demand  create demand".

CIM Group is a full-service urban real estate and infrastructure fund manager with approximately $19.2 billion of assets under management. Since its founding in 1994  CIM has been a process- and research-driven investor that mitigates risk through the fundamental analysis of the long-term drivers in communities. CIM is a relative value investor that systematically targets investments that are priced below their long-term intrinsic value. Over time  CIM has delivered a strong risk-adjusted track record of returns by relying on its vertically integrated team  investment discipline and sourcing capabilities.

organization_site: Visit the Sun Finance Group website
organization_description: Sun Finance Group is a Latvian financial technology company operating as an online and mobile lending marketplace. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Riga  Latvia. Sun Finance is present in several countries in Europe  Asia and Latin America. It engages in the operation of an online loan marketplace for consumers seeking private loans and other credit-based offerings. Its consumer segment includes micro loans  small business loans  personal loans and consumer loans.

Temenos (SIX: TEMN)  headquartered in Geneva  is a leader in banking software  partnering with banks and other financial institutions to transform their businesses and stay ahead of a changing marketplace. Over 3 000 firms worldwide  including 41 of the top 50 banks  rely on Temenos to process the daily transactions of more than 500 million banking customers. The company offers cloud-native  cloud-agnostic  API-first digital banking  core banking  payments  fund management  and wealth management software products. Temenos software enable its clients to achieve cost-income ratios of 25.2% and returns on equity of 25.0%  two times better than the industry average.

organization_site: Visit the Tianjin Jinbin Development Co. website
organization_description: Tianjin Jinbin Development Co. is a publicly listed corporation established in 1998. It is mainly engaged in real estate. Its investment construction projects include office buildings  industrial parks and residences.

TradeAsia International is in the business of industrial raw materials for chemicals and polymers in Asia  Africa  the Middle East and Latin America. With more than 20 years experience in business led by a versatile team  it supports the needs of customers in more than 40 countries around the world. TradeAsia  with its physical presence in 10 important Asian markets powered by multiple online platforms  is capable of fulfilling the requirements of customers by providing an integrated and optimized supply chain service to customers. It is also actively integrating customer requirements with its logistics business to provide a complete supply chain service to customers globally.

transcosmos offers cost reduction and sales expansion services. The company pursues operational excellence by providing these services through 156 locations in 26 countries  with a focus on Asia. The e-commerce market has expanded globally. Thus  transcosmos provides a comprehensive  one-stop global e-commerce service delivering products and services to consumers in 36 countries. The company aims to be its clients global business process outsourcing (BPO) partner  providing them with high-quality BPO services on a global scale.

organization_site: Visit the Transport Corporation of India website
organization_description: Transport Corporation of India is one of Indias largest logistics service providers  with services that include road  air  rail  express and sea transportation  warehousing  international clearing and forwarding  and supply and demand chain management. The company has a network of 1 400 offices  a workforce of 6 000 people and a fleet of 9 000 trucks. It moves more than 2.5% of Indias GDP by value every year.

U-Earths goal is to create as many Pure Air Zones around the world as possible with help from all of the people  companies and public entities who want to be remembered by future generations as the ones who made the planet breathable again.

organization_site: Visit the VdA Legal Partners website
organization_description: Vieira de Almeida (VdA) is an international corporate law firm with 40 years of history. Its legal services cover several industries and practice areas. VdA has been recognized for its outstanding and innovative services  having received prestigious legal industry accolades and awards internationally. Through the VdA Legal Partners network  clients have access to 13 jurisdictions  with coverage in all Portuguese-speaking and several French-speaking African countries  and Timor-Leste. It is active in Angola  Cabo Verde  Cameroon  Chad  Congo  Democratic Republic of the Congo  Equatorial Guinea  Gabon  Guinea-Bissau  Mozambique  Portugal  Sao Tome and Principe  Timor-Leste.

Verra catalyses tangible climate action and sustainable development outcomes. Verra’s standards drive large-scale investment to high-impact activities that tackle some of the most pressing environmental and social issues of today.

VFS Global is among the worlds largest visa outsourcing and technology services specialists for governments and diplomatic missions worldwide. The company manages the administrative and non-judgmental tasks related to visa  passport and consular services for its client governments. This enables them to focus entirely on the critical task of assessment.

Vibrant Energy designs and develops renewable energy projects while also overseeing the operations and maintenance. The company adheres to institutional standards of corporate governance  social responsibility and transparency in every project.

Vietcombank is a large commercial bank in Viet Nam  established in 1963. It successfully launched an initial public offering (IPO) in 2007 and officially became the Commercial Bank for Foreign Trade of Vietnam in 2008. An mergers and acquisitions (M&A) deal in 2011 made Mizuho Corporate Bank its strategic partner  with 15% ownership. Vietcombank provides products and services covering commercial banking  investment banking and fund management.

First established in 1992 as Circle Freight International (Cambodia) after the signing of the Paris Peace Agreement  the company was registered as WorldBridge International (Cambodia) in 1994. It is the first local logistics company in Cambodia  serving the United Nations  the United States Embassy  and related bodies  such as the United Nations Development Programme  the World Food Programme  and the World Health Organization. The company has since developed partnerships with other logistics companies across Asia and worldwide.

Xenco Medical is a medical device manufacturer that has pioneered a new category of surgical implant systems with its sterile-packaged spinal implants pre-attached to disposable  polymer-based delivery instruments. Outperforming reused implant systems in consistency  the risk of pathogen transmission  and in eliminating the expensive processes associated with sterilization of reprocessed instruments and implants  Xenco Medical’s devices have been found to save hospitals 900 to 1100 dollars per surgery. With the sterile-packaged  composite polymer instruments and spinal implants attached together in each package  the single-use Xenco Medical implant systems are designed to both increase efficiency in the operating room as well as eliminate the internal logistics associated with the autoclave process. Existing at the intersection of materials science and mechanical engineering  Xenco Medical’s single-use spinal systems are the first polymer-based devices of their kind. Xenco Medical has also become the first spinal implant manufacturer to make its instruments and implants available through surgical vending machines.

Zahid Group represents a diverse range of companies offering comprehensive  customer-centric solutions in a number of thriving industries. Some of those include construction; mining; oil and gas; agriculture; power  electricity and water generation; material handling; building materials; transportation and logistics; real estate development; travel and tourism; waste management and recycling; and hospitality.

organization_site: Visit the Zhongguancun Development Group website
organization_description: Zhongguancun Development Group (ZDG) was established in April 2010 based on the previously developed Ten Parks  One Area in the Zhongguancun National Autonomous Innovation Demonstration Zone. ZDGs registered capital is RMB17.4 billion. It has 18 initial shareholders and 21 holding subsidiaries  with total assets of RMB88.6 billion and net assets of RMB22.4 billion. ZDG has a AAA long-term credit rating.
3yourmind is revolutionizing manufacturing with software to optimize  standardize and automate additive manufacturing (AM) workflows.

A/O PropTech is among Europe’s largest property technology venture capital firms. It invests in technology start-up companies disrupting the real estate industry. Through its strategic RE sandbox  it enables founders to test  pilot  iterate and scale disruptive tech-enabled products  services and platforms and helps them navigate the complexities of the real estate ecosystem at scale. Its mission is to transform real estate into a more digital  efficient  and accessible asset class by applying innovative technologies and business models. A/O’s vision is to improve quality of life  accelerate sustainable living  and enable the decarbonization of the largest asset class in the world.

Aera Technology was founded in 2017 with a vision to transform the future of work through decision intelligence. Through the Aera Decision Cloud  Aera is helping organizations scale and speed decision-making and achieve breakthrough efficiencies in agility  performance and the state of work  with less environmental impact. The platform is comprehensive  composable  trusted and scalable – providing the technology and capabilities to orchestrate complex decision-making processes at scale – across systems  data sources and people. Enterprises worldwide are turning to Area to transform how they respond to the ever-changing environment  at the speed required today.

Akselos has created one of the world’s fastest and most advanced engineering simulation technologies to help protect critical infrastructure and accelerate the energy transition. The companys flagship product  the Digital Guardian  is revolutionizing the management of large  complex assets by offering real-time  condition-based monitoring and a window into the future with predictive analytics.

Aleph Farms is a food company that was co-founded with Israeli foodtech incubator the Kitchen Hub and Shulamit Levenberg of the Technion Institute of Technology  Israel. The company is paving a new way forward in the field of cultivated meat  growing real beef steaks directly from the cells.

Alesca Life is an agricultural technology company that builds indoor vertical farms and farm management solutions to make food production more localized and data-driven. Its vision is to democratize access to fresh and nutritious food by democratizing the means and knowledge of production. Alesca has developed patented hardware systems  operational management software  real time monitoring and automation devices  and computer vision artificial intelligence systems to grow plants using 95% to 99% less water  fertiliser and land compared to traditional farms and without chemical pesticides. Alesca is active in Japan  China  Singapore  Saudi Arabia  the United Arab Emirates  and South Africa.

Altana is building the infrastructure of trusted global commerce. Altana’s AI-powered platform renders billions of data points across the entire supply chain into a living model – a shared source of truth on global commerce that serves as the infrastructure of trusted networks  helping governments and businesses solve the most pressing challenges of globalization  such as climate change  wealth inequality  supply chain stability  and national security.

Amogy is a sustainable energy start-up that is working on a novel carbon-free energy system using ammonia as a renewable fuel. The innovative solution enables the decarbonization of ground  sea and air transportation  accelerating the journey to net-zero emissions economies.

Antora converts low-cost  intermittent renewable electricity into a reliable  on-demand source of zero-emissions industrial heat and power. Antora’s thermal batteries can discharge zero-carbon electricity and/or heat at temperatures up to 1500°C or higher  enabling the cost-effective elimination of gigatons of emissions.

Astroscale is a Singapore-based satellite services company that was founded in 2013 with the objective of developing innovative solutions to the growing quantity of space debris. The companys mission is to actively contribute to the sustainable use of the space environment by developing scalable and innovative on-orbit technologies in order to safely remove the most threatening debris in orbit. In addition to spacecraft debris removal technologies  Astroscale is invested in providing debris monitoring and tracking capabilities.

With a vision that sharing technology for the internet of things should be simpler  the one-stop Avanci marketplace licenses intellectual property from many different companies in a single transaction. Avanci’s approach is more efficient  reducing risk and transaction costs  and increasing transparency. Avanci enables companies contributing technologies to get a fair return and companies using those technologies to obtain licenses at a fair price  accelerating connectivity for all.

Avellino’s mission is to ethically and securely collect  organize and share genetic data to maximize its predictive diagnostic and therapeutic benefits to accelerate positive outcomes for individuals worldwide. As a global leader in leveraging artificial intelligence-powered algorithms  Avellino’s diagnostics provide eye care professionals with personalized genetic data to predict eye disease  prevent disease progression and preserve vision. Its R&D team has made groundbreaking discoveries in early detection of oncology  a polygenic risk score for glaucoma  and a siRNA gene-silencing therapeutic for the treatment of granular corneal dystrophy type II. Avellino is headquartered in California  with operations in Korea  Japan and the United Kingdom.
Best Practice Artificial Intelligence is a leading open library of artificial intelligence use cases  case studies and best practices.

BigSpring is solving the global skilling crisis by aligning the needs of employers and workers. Its mobile learning platform equips people with the lifelong learning they need to be gainfully employed and enables employers to measure return on investment from learning to establish it as a core business driver  not a discretionary expense. BigSpring learners map their employment goals to market needs  create skill portfolios that showcase proficiency  engage in learning communities comprised of peers and coaches  and measure employability in real-time. It has 500 000 learners in Asia-Pacific  Africa and the Americas. Its clients include Uber  United Technologies  Tata and OYO.

Black Lake is a cloud-based  internet of things-enabled collaboration software as a service that helps manufacturers digitally transform shop floor activities and facilitate real-time collaboration. Its smart collaboration platform empowers factory staff to collaborate digitally  monitor data  extract insights  and make data-driven decisions. The platform runs on both smart tablets and PC-based web browsers  which integrates seamlessly with production facilities and equipment  enabling last-mile data collection.

BrainBox AI uses deep learning  cloud-based computing  algorithms and a proprietary process to support a 24/7 self-operating building that requires no human intervention and enables maximum energy efficiency. Pre-commercialization tests have demonstrated that BrainBox AI enables a 25-35% reduction in total energy costs in less than three months  with low to no capital expenditure needed from property owners. It also improves occupant comfort by 60% and decreases the carbon footprint of a building by 20-40%.

Brightseed is a pioneer in biosciences and artificial intelligence (AI) that illuminates nature to restore human health. Forager  Brightseed’s proprietary AI  accelerates bioactive discovery  biological validation and ingredient formulation from years to months  rapidly revealing new connections between nature and humanity. Through Forager and clinical evaluation  Brightseed partners with organizations across the consumer health continuum to offer insight into the world of bioactives and health solutions.
The Cantellus Group is an artificial intelligence and emerging technologies consulting firm.

Canvass AI is disrupting the way industrial operational data is being used to make critical business decisions. The Canvass AI Platform helps transform plant operations  delivering predictive insights that empower decision-making based on operational data rather than intuition or gut-feeling. It ingests millions of operational data points and provides real-time actionable insights – a monumental leap for plant operations teams. Canvass AI helps plant operations get more insights  more quickly and easily  driving powerful improvements in production processes  maintenance and energy management programmes.

CasperLabs is a blockchain platform purpose-built to scale opportunities for everyone. Building for blockchain’s next frontier  CasperLabs is designed for real-world applications without sacrificing usability  cost  decentralization or security. The company removes the barriers that prevent mainstream blockchain adoption by making blockchain friendly to use  open to the world and future-proof to support innovations today and tomorrow.
